I loved the air con and the room service (very cheap and nice). The place even has a small gym which I used once. Staff are great and i enjoyed the pedicure.
title: Chilled place

text:
We booked here as we were attending a wedding. there were about 15 or so rooms that had bene booked by the wedding party. The so called deluxe room was quite ordinary, in any 3 star hotel around the world. The pool was really tiny. The service was horrendous. We could only get one key per room, and when we requested an iron, there were none available for most of us. Apparently they only had one iron for the entire hotel that has 40 + rooms. 
The internet was horrible, and even trying to chicken for your flight was a nightmare. Breakfast was ordinary and if there were a few people at a time you had mixed up orders and if you are time bound no breakfast before you need to head off. :)
title: Very ordinary for the price.

text:
Stayed here for a birthday treat from my fiancé. Everything was perfect. No compliantly whatsoever! 
Room - great aircon, amazingly comfy bed, nice bathroom, enough to storage etc and a lovely pool view. Also very quiet and peaceful. 
Communal area - big clean pool which gets sun most of the day, restaurant/lounge area tidy and well maintained, nice views of rice fields/gardens. 
Staff - very friendly. Wouldn't accept payment for some paracetamol when my fiancé had a headache. Very polite and speak good English. I was surprised by the staff delivering a cake to our room and singing happy birthday to me!
Breakfast - great selection of items included in room rate. Lots of food! 
Overall I would definitely recommend the Kirana to anyone looking for a relaxing and luxurious place to stay. I would suggest a room on 2/3rd floors as the poolside rooms aren't too private whilst the pool is open. 

Old mans

Visited Old Man's with friends lots whilst in Canggu for 3 nights. Good and drinks excellent. Staff a bit lifeless but they're busy all day so probably a bit knackered which is understandable!! Very reasonably priced considering quality of food/drink, location and surroundings/decor. Very pleasant indeed. Will be going again next time were in Canngu.
title: Perfect

text:
We stayed in 2 pool access rooms which were very clean and modern. I love how we could just open our bedroom door and literally roll out into the pool, kids loved that too. However, it is a bit odd to have people sit on the sun loungers just outside your door....we didn't mind but it is a bit odd. Only around 10 sun loungers for the entire hotel too, but it was never a problem as we spent most of our time at the beach. 

Breakfast was very good, staff very polite and only 5 minutes walk to the beach. Great restaurants a few minutes walk away, our favourite was Betelnut. Itahaca also very nice.

A beautiful hotel in a quiet and lovely part of Bali, far away from the 'horribleness' of Kuta!! Would love to visit again
title: Lovely

text:
We were a largish group of about 11 couples who stayed at this hotel to attend a wedding in the area.

The hotel is pretty nice, the staff very helpful and well meaning but for the price and ratings as 4 star, it certainly falls short.

Our group had 3 ocean view rooms, 3 deluxe, 2 pool view & 2 suites.

The rooms are comfortable & clean.

The bathroom was decent but the shower cubicle did not seal well and once you finish showering, there was water right across the whole bathroom.

The amenities did not include the basic razor.

There is no mirror anywhere except the bathroom, even in the suite, which we found strange, most hotels have a full size mirror to assist with dressing up.

+'s: The spa is great, book early and ensure you turn up on time.
The pools are nice and the beach not far away.
The staff are very helpful

-'s: The staff could not assist with simple things, like an iron box, we were told there was only 1 in the whole hotel!!! Took 2 days for them to get it for us!
The restaurant service is painfully slow, b'fast for 6 people, took 40+ mins to arrive- we only ordered the standard American breakfast.

Not much to do around, but Seminyak is not too far & Batu Balong is a nice beach.
title: Un-impressed with this resort- staff mean well but un-prepared for many regular requests

text: Really nice Hotel, was completely booked when I stayed in October but I did not hear anything or anyone. Great assortment of different breakfasts which can be enjoyed in an green environment. The staff kindly greeted me with a welcome drink before they guided me to the room. They also provided a welcoming massage, top-notch !
title: Reasonable Price for a Great Accomodation

text: The location is great, less than 15 minutes walk to Old Man's and Batu Bolong Beach; about 20 minutes away from Echo Beach. It is also within walking distance (10minutes) from cafes (Betelnut, Crate, Deus, Monsieur Spoon). We stayed on the first floor right beside the pool, room and toilet were kept very clean throughout our stay and staff were extremely friendly and accommodating. We loved the room, comfy beds and fantastic view of the sunset 10 steps away from the bed.
title: Comfort and hospitality in Canggu

text: The staff goes out of their way to make you comfortable. This hotel is amazing. We loved the food and the location. It is just a quick walk down to Old Man's/Batu Balong Beach. The food is fantastic, and the free breakfast is perfect. They had our laundry done in less than 12 hours and placed it in the room for us. The rooms are comfortable and clean with new amenities. We especially liked the rooftop deck for happy hour, they have 2 for 1 drinks and it is a perfect place to watch the sunset over the ocean. I will definitely be going beck. We started our time here in Bali and decided to stay here at the end of our trip because it was so great...
title: Fantastic Spot!

photos.caption: View from roof deck during happy hour...

text:
We could not have been happier with our stay at the Kirana Hotel. Staff was superb, always ready with a smile and would go the extra mile to help you out. Our room, while not that spacious, was adequate to our needs. Best part of the hotel was its Location! Walking distance to Old Man's and other restaurants. Only downer I could say about our stay was the food could use some improvement. Though we only ate there during breakfast time. But that experience alone did not make us crave to try out lunch or dinner there. There are a lot of great restaurants just outside the hotel so we just did that.

Kudos to the Front desk staff for arranging our transfers, our motorbike rental and dinner reservations at Kuta and Seminyak. 

Tried out their couples massage and I could say that it was worth the money. Wifi could get iffy sometimes though. Also their shower partition was a little narrow so the bathroom floor would get wet when you take a bath. Other than that, I would definitely stay here again when we go back to Canggu next year.
title: Best place to stay in Canggu

text: Stayed here as part of a wedding party for a week. From start to finish the customer service was quite frankly some of the best I have ever experienced in all of my travels. Friendly, attentive and fun, these guys have it sorted! The hotel is a short walk to the beach which is really lovely. My only thoughts are that they need to sort out the pool area as access to rooms on ground floor can be compromised by sun beds. Definitely be back.
title: Just the best staff ever!

text:
My partner and I had a delightful 7 day stay at the Hotel Kirana in Canggu, Bali, last week.
We found the property to be very comfortable and a pleasure to stay in. The staff were exceptionally friendly and it was a touch sad to say goodbye when we left. The rooms were of a very high standard and we enjoyed our breakfast and both evening meals in the hotel restaurant. The Kirana is well situated with the beach only a five minute walk down the road with lots of cafes and shops along the way. If there was one issue, it was that there are no power points for use of a hairdryer in the bathroom. A hairdryer is provided in most rooms but there is no power point near a mirror. Only a minor complaint in what otherwise was a memorable holiday.
title: Very happy and enjoyable stay at Hotel Kirana

text: Definately try the Kirana hotel for a relaxing stay in bali. Warm, friendly and attentive staff. Fantastic infinity pool, great food,  weekend rooftop bar (i highly recommend the magaritas), shuttle bus and close to the beach. FANTASTIC!
title: Justine mcknight

text: We've had the pleasure of staying at the Kirana twice now. The first thing to highlight is just how friendly and helpful the staff are. It starts from the moment you check in, to the porter, to the restaurant staff, to the staff in the spa. They're happy to help and always with a smile on their face. The location is great as well. Just a short walk down to Old Man's and the beach. Our favourite cafe is Betelnut and it's just a short walk away as well. If you're tired of walking or looking to go a bit farther afield they also have complimentary bikes. Rooms are clean with comfy beds. If you don't have kids, I would maybe recommend not going for a room by the pool. Can be a bit loud in the morning.
title: Second visit and definitely not the last!

text: Great location...5 min walk to beaches for surfing and also to Old Man's ....2 min walk to amazing Mexican restaurant.  Nice rooms...great staff...very good breakfast...cheap mini bar prices... Had room service dinner and it was ok. Pool is quite small and not many seats ..but overall great hotel and would happily stay again .
title: Very Happy

text: good location short walk to beach/surf and Old Mans, hotel was very clean and well kept, excellent breakfast, comfy bed, nice pool,  views of the sea/surf, wi fi and aircon ok, quiet, worth taking a walk in both directions from hotel plenty to see, plenty of eating places at cheap and good value and not so cheap warungs, staff pleasant and are able to arrange transfers or transport. good surf board hire at beach plenty of choice of boards.
title: Really nice place close to good surfing beaches

text:
This is a nice little hotel in Canggu close to Old Mans, Echo Beach, the People's Bar and Deus. It has a miniature rice paddy out the front which we saw planted over the course of our stay. 
There's not much to do at the hotel itself, but they have free daily shuttles to Seminyak, and happily arrange a driver for any other travelling you like. 
Hotel staff are super-friendly and helpful and it's a great  home base for your holiday. 
Food and drinks in the hotel restaurant were comparatively expensive for Bali, and Canggu itself is quite expensive - It costs twice as much to get a taxi out of the area as it does to get in. The spa services in the hotel are excellent and very good value, I would have made more use of them if I didn't need to book 2 days ahead. That they were always fully booked just proves how good the therapists are. 

In a few months, when the construction in the area is complete, and its possible to walk to the beach and not dodge cars & bikes, this will be a very popular place to stay.
title: Great staff made our stay enjoyable

text:
From the check in process until the check out process, all went smooth without any hiccups. Too bad suite rooms were all occupied. But my Kirana room was spotless clean and i LOVE the bed. Breakfast was YUM!
Rooftop is a nice spot for sunset cocktails and I regret that I have missed the movie screening. The pool looks nice for a dip after a hot day under the sun but i was mostly at the beach. The 1-hour massage truly was one of the highlights. Ms. Komang the therapist has magic hands i would rate her a 9! Cant wait to go back !
title: Attentive and wonderful staffs, amazing breakfast, and only a few minutes walk to the beach! Will come back!

text:
we stayed at the penthouse, very clean, tidy and super nice view from the penthouse.
it's very close to the beach and cafes. the hotel also provide free shuttle to Seminyak town. Staff are very friendly and helpful.
title: Great location and foods!

text: This is a great hotel for a stay in Bali. Short walking distance to the beaches, bars and cafes in the area, clean comfortable rooms, lovely pool area for relaxing and the restaurant serves excellent Balinese food. The breakfast is among the best I've had in Bali.  The staff are very friendly and helpful. There is fab rooftop area for watching the awesome sunsets.
title: Great stay in Bali!

text: Cool looking hip hotel property so close to the beach, good restaurants and even great shopping. It was our first stop in Bali from LA.  The hotel staff was so friendly especially Lynda and Dewa that we decided on the back end of our 3 week trip we would go back to stay two more nights! And we did. The rooms were nicely decorated, clean and bed was super comfortable loved the pillows.  A good nights sleep after a long travel is always needed.  They served a great breakfast included in your stay which is not unusual in Bali and the food was good.  Went to the spa as they had a great package for couples and so I went for it. If you like surfing, mopeds in not such a congested part of Bali, good vibe Beach restaurants and fun bars with a chill vibe this is your spot. I loved Canggu and really liked the Kirana.  We will be back!
title: Cool vibe and great location!

text: Very clean and tidy hotel, the staff are very friendly. The breakfast was good but too many egg dishes. We loved the location which was a short walk from the beach and on a quiet road. Overall we were very pleased with our stay.
title: Great small hotel

text:
We have stayed in Canggu before, and the stay at this hotel was great. It was centrally located, walking or scootering distance to food and beach. We stayed on the top floor and had a spacious room with ocean views and a veranda. There is a lift if you don't want to use the stairs. Beach towels were supplid and there was a hairdryer and toiletries in the room. The staff were really helpful, friendly, warm and welcoming. Nothing was too much trouble.
For breakfast there were several choices from traditional indo (give it a try - it was different but yummy) to fruit, eggs, pancakes and pastries - that were all equally good. We had the occasional lunch and dinner, that were also good and reasonably priced. The cappuccino was good and a real surprise. 
We used the spa, and this was very reasonably priced. There are really cheap places about - but I have a few back issues that I don't want to aggravate. The staff were really good in this regard.
It was Indonesian Independence day during our stay. What we loved was that the hotel and staff had an afternoon of celebration for the local children. The staff organised games (getting coins out of watermelons with teeth, placing eels in bottles and colouring contests), food and a lot of fun. The staff did a pillow fight over a pit of mud, which was enjoyed by all. A guest came second on this contest! It was lovely to see some helping the community - the 50 or so kids had a great time and the staff did a good job of managing this and guests.
title: good location, friendly staff

text:
Great location, easy walk to old mans beach and 3 minute scoot to Eco beach. 
The staff were amazing so helpful and friendly. The rooms are basic but with everything you need. The pool is a bit average, better off going to the beach and really close to the down stairs rooms so you feel like you’re in someone’s pool as the rooms 2m from the pool.
title: great location and great service

text: Lovely Staff, nice looking new hotel and just a short walk to the beach. My room was very comfortable and the bed you could stay in all day and night. nice pool but limited day beds. meals were very nice as was the breakfast. Wi-Fi did drop in and out a bit. I would come back again, loved the area not so in your face with the hard sell.
title: Great Hotel and fantastic bed

text: It's a lovely and cozy hotel at a very nice location in Canggu, the facilities are new and staffs are very helpful and friendly. Breakfast is lovely with variety of choices. Wifi is nice and the spa also lovely.
title: Lovely and peaceful.

text:
The hotel is perfectly located in Canggu with all the amenities one would require for the amazing price its at. 
Restaurant and bar available with a variety of offers, and nearby plenty of restaurants and shops. The hotel is great, and sometimes, you don't want to leave!
The sun beds by the pool are limited, so get there fast and bask under the sun the whole day!
The pool was actually very cold, from the 9 days we were there, I got in only once.
The wifi isn't that strong if you have some actual work to do, so don't depend on it. Nearby cafes, and Salty Volt may offer better connections.

The gym is also quite small, but serves the basics.

We had a great stay at the Kirana compared to other places in Canggu that are more expensive and offer way less. 

Enjoy it!
title: Just perfect!

photos.caption: Free bike rentals from the hotel
Rooms by the pool, we stayed there

text:
We arrived very late and checked in after 9pm. I was shocked by the toxic smell in the room which lasted forever. I had a horrible headaches for few days after that. My bf didnt want to move rooms, so I had to stay there. The aircon is like a machine, which is super loud. They gave us the room on the first floor with full view on the pool. In the morning it is very noisy, as it also overlook on the restaurant where the breakfast is. The pillows are also synthetic and very uncomfortable, obviously the hotel of such a standard doesnt have good ones.
Only after check out, we went to another room and saw an ocean. After checking our reservation, which was sea view, they tried to convinced us that our room is a sea view!!! Nonsense. Overall very poor service, quality and cheating reservation system.
Wont recommend to anyone. Very disappointed.
title: The rooms are not sea view as in reservations

text:
Lovely new hotel, friendly staff, clean and nice!
Only 8 sunbeds near the pool is nog enough.
Would really recommand this hotel. Also great location in canggu near the beach (10 minutes walk) and several nice cafés (cafe betelnut and cafe avocado).
title: Great hotel

text:
Lovely new, clean hotel, great location and absolutely fantastic staff!

The only problem is, is that there is only eight sunbeds to the entire hotel!? Madness! 

Used the spa whilst staying here, that too was fabulous and worth every penny. Highly recommend. 

I can't say enough about the wonderful staff, so welcoming and friendly, really make you feel at home and nothing is too much of an ask. Thank you. 

Breakfast was one of the best we've had in Bali, excellent quality and lots of choice. 

Rooms clean with good sizes. 

Pool access rooms aren't worth the extra, not private enough two of the eight sunbeds are right outside your door with people sunbathing on them (couldn't even use a subbed outside your own door) so we had to keep our curtains closed most of the time which goes against the whole idea of having a pool access room.  

Lovely and quiet at night. Would recommend if you're wanting to stay in Canggu or near echo beach.
title: Lovely stay but needs more sunbeds!!!

text: The staff here were super lovely and accommodating. When I was bitten by a wasp they took care of me and supplied ointment and checked on me for days afterwards (thank you Sri & Putu!). I was stuck in Bali because of the volcanic eruption and spent an extra 4 nights here. Clean, great bed, breakfast was adequate with a number of options. Beach is a short walk, or hire a scooter from the hotel for the best of Canggu. Deus and Betelnut are down the road, as is Old Man's. Thanks for my home away from home x
title: Great Location - Super helpful staff

text: Upon arriving in Bali my fiancé & I spent two wonderful days at the Kirana and their sister residence property.  The Kirana staff was very helpful, friendly and beyond accommodating.  The property itself is lovely, stylish yet comfortable room and a great breakfast! The location is so close to the beach, shops and restaurants.  We had the couples massage package in the spa and was blown away with how relaxing and romantic it was...neither of us had every done anything like this and really enjoyed. Yes we have been to a spa, just not doing the treatments together. What a epic experience and incredible spa staff. We really enjoyed our stay and have already looked at booking a few more nights later in our trip before returning home.  If you want to get away from all the noise in Kuta and Seminyak, but still have great vibe, close to beach with good shops, restaurants and a relaxing place to stay, this is the spot!  And it is a new property with a great pool and grounds.  Can't wait to go back!
title: Best spot in Canggu!

text:
Positives: Walking distance to Batu Bolong / Canggu / Echo beach - famous surf spots. Close by to a few restaurants and bars - as such, there's no need to go to Seminyak unless it's for a specific restaurant or for one of the big clubs i.e., Potato Head, Ku De Ta. Love the landscape design and interior deco. Good service by the staff. Decent food at the in-house restaurant. Great 2-in-1 paddy field view on the way to the beach. I'd suggest getting a bike/bicycle if you'd like to explore the area - maybe to check out the different beachfronts (they are about 5 mins away from each other).

Negatives: Shower and sink drainage wasn't too great. Wi-fi signal is poor and can be improved.
title: New hotel, walking distance to Batu Bolong beach

text: I stayed here on a recent surf trip to Bali and found the Kirana a very comfortable, well priced hotel in a good location just down the road (5 mins walk) from Batu Bulong beach.  The room was clean, spacious and comfortable, the food was nice but the best selling point of the hotel is the staff who were super friendly and helpful.  Definitely one of my top choices for a mid-price range place to stay.
title: Very Comfortable Friendly Hotel

text:
These people are amazing, really went out of their way to make sure I had a great stay. I had a lovely pool side room, was clean, modern and everything I needed. 
Great location, couple minutes to the beach and to a couple of great restaurants.
title: Great place to stay, would come back!

text: We only stayed for two nights in July and had a bottom storey suite booked. Wow, what a lovely surprise this hotel was. We loved everything about it - the location, the setting, the room, the views, the decor, the lovely garden, the staff and only wished we had booked more nights! We were reluctant to leave, but will definitely go back. The suite room was spacious, well set out and the bedroom was quite luxurious! Our son had a rollaway bed in the living area and there was enough room for the three of us.
title: Super Hotel in a great Location

text: My boyfriend and I have stayed at the Kirana a few times now as it quickly became our 'go to' hotel in Canngu. The rooms are spacious and clean with a great sized balcony. The breakfast al a carte is delicious and includes enough food to keep you full until the afternoon! Well priced, great value.
title: Will always go back!

text: The rooms, breakfast, amenities, massage and location all have a thumbs up. Good value for money and the hospitality shown by the staff are fantastic. The only two small improvements are the wifi (only good connection at the restaurant or lobby) and they will need to hire more than two masseurs or more rooms. Only a couple room is available and it operates from 9am - 5pm. Else, we had a great stay and will be back.
title: Best hotel in Canggu

text: The Kirana is an ideal hotel if one visits to stay close to a beach and do some surfing. The canggu beach is just 5 minutes walk from this place. A very warm welcome awaited us when we reached Kirana. Our rooms were nice and cosy though the size of the room was little small but was done beautifully. The choice of breakfast was limited but the food was tasty and good. The place is surrounded by nice eating joints so one has a lot of options to choose from. The staff was very friendly and courteous. We for sure would highly recommend this place. The spa services were average.
title: Very welcoming, cosy and lovely hotel

text: Good value - check booking online & with hotel direct. Great location  - short walk to the beach & many restaurants close by. Rooms spacious, clean, comfy & well maintained. Very friendly & helpful staff. Stayed in pool access room & had no problem with noise as mentioned by others.
title: Good vaue, great location.

text:
we just got back from a trip to the Gili Islands with a stop in canggu. I picked this hotel because it was the cheapest place I could find that still looked liveable! 

When we arrived we were in total shock, 10 mins away from Seminyak and we arrived in paradise, the resort upgraded us to the penthouse suite which was beautiful of them. the room was to die for with views of the beach close by. the food in the restaurant was like dining in a 5 star restaurant back home! the staff were probably the best part about the stay (excluding the room of course), everyone was lovely and made us feel very special. 

We got massages in the spa and they were amazing too! If we wanted to go to Seminyak there were free shuttle buses that ran throughout the day, alternatively you could ask for staff to call a car for you which would be at a set price, which is just how we like it. 

5 mins down the road is the beach with food options along the way! The staff even gave us a tour of the four bedroom villa they have at the hotel which is seperate to the resort, it is like a beverly hills mansion and we will be heading back there with friends at the end of the year!
title: an amazing room upgrade

text:
Came here a couple of months ago with my sister.
Rooms were clean
Staff very friendly.
Nice atmosphere and everything is new and fresh.
Worth the money and close to the beach and cafes and restaurants etc.
Great place
They also do roof top sunset weddings
title: Great hotel at affordable prices

text:
Great location, only 5 min walk to beach also lots of great eateries within easy walking distance.

Hotel is nice, rooms aren't huge but the bed is! King bed, so comfy!!!! Nice wee balcony. Ocean views on levels 2 & 3.

Breakfast was included in our reasonable night rate, and it was huge! With a really big selection. Good food, great fast service.

All the staff are very nice and super helpful. They also have complimentary push bikes, which is a nice touch
title: Will stay here again

text:
Only stayed for one night whilst in limbo with accomodation, yet this hotel was great!!!! Perfect location close to the beach, wonderful friendly, helpful staff, and clean rooms.

Stayed as a couple in June 2015 and would stay again, nice and close to the famous OLD MANS!
title: Small, clean, LOCATION!!!!

text: Hotel was great. Clean. Food was lovely. Staff were fantastic. Would stay again and would recommend. Location is really close to Old Man's surf break. Tried a few restaurants in the area but kept finding ourselves eating at the hotel because of the high quality and cleanliness.
title: Fabulous stay

text:
Kirana was just great! When we arrived, everyone was so friendly and welcoming. Food was very very delicious!

The location is asolutly perfect. Near to reach the beach (for surfing) and a lot of restaurants.

Massage was one of the best we had in bali. 

Room was clean with a balcon towards the sun.
title: Holidays

photos.caption: The Kirana Hotel Resto and Spa

text:
Bali is changing quickly. This is a modern hotel with all the modern conveniences (wifi, nice pool, etc). Old Man's Beach and a variety of restaurants and services are only a short walk away. It's as far removed from the chaos of Kuta as it is from a beach bungalow with roaming chickens and cows. It's clean, quiet, and friendly, but you won't find yourself hanging out with locals at the bar. 
The most outstanding part of the hotel is the service. As a solo traveler. I asked a lot of questions and took a lot of everyone's time. Everyone went out of their way to make sure I had everything I needed for my adventures, and always with a smile. The staff is outstanding - friendly, professional, and efficient. 
I miss the old Bali a bit, but it's nice to see Balinese hospitality hasn't changed.
title: Nice hotel with fantastic service

text:
The staff at the Kirana hotel will do everything to make your stay as comfortable as possible. From welcome drinks to an anniversary cake at 23:00 when we arrived, we could not possibly have asked for more. 

We had a beautiful and romantic stay in this gorgeous hotel and could not have asked for a more hospitable and genuinely welcoming introduction to Bali. 

Make sure that you get the banana fritters for breakfast!
title: A beautiful introduction to Bali

text:
Decent stay. Ups and downs. Inconsistent in quality. 
Although a bit small, rooms are fine (we had a second floor room with views on the ocean). Balcony small (not that it mattered to me, but might for some). 
Disappointed with bathroom : nowhere to put your shower gel and shampoo etc... The shower screen doesn't go all the way to the floor which results in a flooded bathroom floor at each shower... The water wasn't too hot either. 
The air con remote wasn't working so we had to ask for replacement batteries. Tthey did it straight away, so it's no big deal. 
The water bottles by the sink (as you can't drink tap water on the island) had lids that require bottle openers but non was provided... 
The WiFi is not great, but it could vary from one room to the other, I'm unsure. Ours was pretty average (although I know we can live without the Internet!)

The hotel has nice facilities. 
The breakfast is ok, the service is a little slow though. 

Special note about the spa : the girls are really good. The treatment was delightful (romance package). I have now had a serious number of massages done in Bali over the past 7 years, and this one is definitely on my top 3. The view is lovely, and my therapist was just amazing. Worth the money (just don't forget to add the 21% tax on fees). My partner didn't want a scrub, so he got something else instead at no extra charge. 

Location of the hotel is great. Few meters away from restaurant/bar Lacalita (few cocktails and tacos maybe?!! , and 5 minutes away from OldMans and the beach.
title: BEST SPA !! Room ok, bathroom average.

text:
We were very pleased with our suite when we arrived. We got a 'trip advisor deal' that included a meal, welcome cocktail & massage, towels, robes etc. The breakfast was good & the staff were lovely. However, the shower leaked badly flooding the floor and the plumbing above & around the bedroom was so noisy it felt like we were inside a washing machine. As the suites were on the ground floor beside the pool it meant we did not have any outdoor space like a balcony, I hung some clothes to dry in our bathroom on the washing line provided but it took days for them to dry & they smelled funny. It's also a bit odd having strangers sunbathing right outside your room. Advice- if you stay in a suite get up early & claim your sun beds with towels (I don't like doing this as I think it's anti-social but there's really no other option).
On the up side, it's an easy walk to restaurants & the beach. Old man's beach club is lively, popular and cool- we enjoyed food, drinks and music there. Bikes are available to go further. The hotel is in a lovely spot and the pool is small but very refreshing :)
title: Pretty spot, warm reception

text: Enjoyed my stay here. Good location close to cafe's / restaurants and exclusive surf beaches in relaxing Canggu. Quality food at the restaurant, clean room and friendly staff. Special mention to Ni Kadek Lynda who went the extra effort to accommodate...will be back for sure.
title: Nice hotel, fantastic service and food

text: We loved our stay in the Kirana Hotel. The location is perfect. It is near surf spot Old Mans . It is just a few minutes from the hotel to this spot. You can rent surfboard and get lesson. I recommend this hotel. The staff is very nice and they do have very good spa. Thanks a lot for you support Kirana. See you next time.
title: Very nice hotel

text:
my second stay there with my big family (came from Jakarta and stay at canggu for the first time). 
Our stay was excellent. Room was clean and beautiful view from room. Close access to swimming pool. 
One thing you should improve is your breakfast. Taste not so good, but for the room service, food was good. 
See you for the next staying there.
title: Excellent

text:
We loved our stay in the Kirana!Location is great,just a few minutes from the shore,which is visited by many surfers!The hotel was the best where we have been staying in Bali!The staff was excellent (special thanks  here to Sri at the Reception and girls in Spa and the staff of the Restaurant did also a very good job).
Keep it up the good job and hope to go back again! :-)
title: Amazing place to stay in Canggu

text:
My husband and I stayed at The Kirana for 4 nights and I highly recommend it. 

Comfortable rooms with a great large bed, friendly staff, good pool and the best selection of breakfasts I have ever had in Bali - try the grilled chicken bruschetta or go the Indo breakfast if only for the pisang goreng  (fried bananas). 

Great location, a few good restaurants in easy walking distance, a spa nearby for massages etc, and a money changer and ATM on the way to the beach which is a short (5 min) walk away. 

All in all a great choice
title: Great find

text: Very close to the beach of Batu Bolong,good service,nice and caring staff and pleasant rooms with great green view!Surprising was to find small fitness hall working 24 hours with a view at green Balinese fields.
title: Very nice place to stay

text: Stayed here for two nights of recovery from a rat invasion in my previous villa! It was a nice treat. Lovely pool. The staff are very helpful, professional and kind. The room was a suite. Beautiful bathroom with shower and tub. Bed was very comfortable. Layout was great. Felt like home, forgot I was in indo for a little while. All the comforts of home. Location is very convenient. Close to old mans surf break. Fantastic coffee shops and restaurants just a short walk away. Have stayed in a few places in Canggu. I would recommend this hotel. It was just too easy. No mosquito bites either :)
title: Great location to Old Mans Surf Break

text:
The Kirana is as good as you'll get in Canggu - clean, modern, beautiful, with a great location 3 minutes' walk to the beach, gorgeous pool and view. But what really makes the Kirana stand out is their staff. From their front manager to the most random bellhop, the staff at the Kirana genuinely want to help, and will do whatever they can to make your stay perfect. 

I stayed here for more than two weeks while doing a yoga teacher training nearby. I ordered lots of room service, had packages mailed here, and got rides in their hotel shuttle at odd hours. The way I travel, using hotels as a base of operations, really brings out the strengths and weaknesses in a place. I have a lot of random needs. The staff at Kirana got it done for me, from a pair of scissors to helping me track down a difficult package I had sent there long after I'd checked out. You really are in excellent hands at the Kirana. Get the chicken saté, watch the sun go down from the pool or your balcony and make friends in the restaurant. I'm definitely coming back!
title: Good hotel, EXCELLENT staff

text: We stayed in Kirana for 12 nights.We were pleased with location, facilities, restaurant and cleaning. We stayed on 2nd floor with a beautiful view on ocean. Hotel is new so local drivers dont really know the location of it, so good advice to write down the adress as on room key there is none. Rooms are nice and designed with taste, size of it could be a bit disadventage for longer stays, but for those who re sightseeing whole days it shouldnt be a problem. Personally I am glad we didnt book a pool room as pool area can be noisy not only from people and nearby restaurant but also from water which is splashing outside infinitive pool with every move. Staff was very frendly and helpful. We had 1 meal in the restaurant which was delicious, but a bit expensive to use in long time period, so we went for dinners at local restaurant Ithaka nearby.
title: Great hotel

photos.caption: pool and view on pool rooms

text: The hotel is in a great location near the most popular surf are in Canggu. This hotel is nice and serve a great breakfast included in your room price. It have bike to ride beach just minutes away and the hotel pool is nice. Great value for the dollar.
title: Great hotel in prime are of Canggu

text: I stayed at the Kirana Hotel Resto and Spa in Canggu for 4 nights and I was delighted. The staff is very friendly, especially Ande, at the front desk. They got us drivers, tours and gave us great details when it comes to helping us out. I recommend !
title: Modern, nice and welcoming

text: We stayed for 3 nights in a deluxe room with an ocean view. Beautiful, spacious, clean room. Great, attentive & friendlyservice from the staff during the whole stay. We arranged to be picked up from the airport, didn't mind the extra cost as we didn't want the hassle of getting a taxi from the airport, it is a little mad there. We also arranged through the hotel to get taken back to the airport, they only use local staff, not taxis, so be prepared to pay a little extra, 200,000 back to the airport was fine with us. A nice walk to the beach, with local markets and a bar. The hotel has bikes you can borrow, which is a nice touch. Lots of good cafes, bars & restaurants walking distance from the hotel too. Overall, absolutely loved our time there!
title: Wonderful hotel & staff

text:
I had stayed 2nights at this hotel.  
It was disappointed... The pool and balcony was so small !!

Breakfast was just ok but and room service was so bad. We couldn't eat it .I had stayed nice places(4star hotels) but I am not stay this hotel again. 
Our room safety box doesn't work.

shuttle bus service is only hotel to Seminyak.
title: It's not 4star hotel

text: I stay in their penthouse suite which has a sea view and private pool. Room was big and clean. The surrounding around the hotel are great. Canggu Beach is nearby, a beach suitable for surfer - just around 800 meter away from the hotel. All the staff are polite and very accommodating staffs. Suitable for a relaxing trip. Overall stay was great.
title: Unforgettable Stay

text:
Pros
Good location, just 5 min walk from the Canggu beach.
Great breakfast.
Modern and tidy.
Very accommodating staffs.
Free shuttle to Seminyak square 3times a day.
Pool is good.

Cons
Dinner menus are limited and relatively expensive.
(You can find many cheap and good restaurants close to the hotel)
Pool is too close to the 1st floor rooms.

Overall, good value for couple who want to do surfing in Canggu area with tidy bed and good breakfast.
title: modern and tidy

text: My overall stay was good. Room was small and clean. My view from my room was great. The pool is too small i think ... several think which I concern was: the sink was stuck. Special mention to ms. Ani from reservation and ms. Lynda from reservation who assist me upon made the booking. Thank you for your help. See you again on 15 May 2015.
title: First stay at canggu

text: Staff where great and location was also very good with it only being a 5 min walk to the surf.  The only issues we found was that it was very hard to get transport into Seminyak and the hotel is falling apart.  We had to ask a few times for the safe to be fixed then I was broken again with in a few hours.  Room was not cleaned every day and late check out was very expensive.  All in all it was a good place to stay with no main issues.
title: Nice location and staff

text:
What makes this hotel superb is the very very nice staff. Always nice service with a smile.
The hotel is not that big witch is nice. Meaning you get to know the staff and the guests.
The room was very nice with good space and excellent view over the ocean and surroundings. Also a nice balcony.
The distance to the beach is only five minutes walking.
Only negative is the space around the pool.
As everywhere on Bali the WiFi is to bad.
title: Supernice hotel

text: Thank you all at the Kirana for a great time. This was the third time staying at your Hotel and each time it gets better. The food was again very good thanks to the input of Made, i hope that will continue now he has gone. Room service and the general service are as good as any 4 star hotel we have stayed at in Bali, which has been many. The surrounding restaurants are also good and of course Old mans bar and restaurant 200-300 metres away can't be faulted particularly 5-6 pm mon -fri for the happy hour, 2 beers for $2.50 every Ozzies dream :) this also includes wines and spirits so all tastes are catered for. Great area of bali for families and surfers with echo beach 5 minutes away. still think Old mans beach is better.
title: Excellent time again

text: If you like to sit around the pool in comfort, like rooms with space and nice-sized balconies, then DON'T go to Kirana. Pool area is so uninviting we stayed one day and left after booking in for a week. Pity help the poor people who booked the "pool access" rooms only to find other guests right outside their front door occupying the very few cushionless lounges available. This means you are a prisoner in your room and have all the noise directly outside. The rooms are all tiny as are the balconies. On the plus side the staff are great and food seemed OK.
title: Average

text:
I have short stayed at The Kirana Bali, it really nice to spend our weekend there. Really nice Hotel with good properties and good design of the room.. Quiet area with very kind of staff... they also provided Free Bicycle .. I really enjoy my time there.

Also thank you for the sales team, Ibu Sri & Lynda..
title: Got the Good Property at Canggu area....

text: What great excitement to get a breakfast choice other than scrambled eggs and omlet. The eggs benedict were delicious thanks to Made. Great location and wonderful staff. We were there for Nyepi and the staff could not have been more helpful in making a day of silence enjoyable. Kate
title: Best breakfast in Bali

text: Lovely hotel, restaurant and spa. Bed was the best I've ever  slept on!  Great  spot for families and couples wanting to relax  for  a few days. Walking distance to great surfing beach and several restaurants. Free shopping shuttle to Seminyak three times per day.
title: Lovely new hotel one block from a popular surfing beach and in a quiet area of Bali's west coast. Excellent staff and ac

text:
Beautiful modern architecture houses this quiet hotel overlooking rice patties with a glimmer of the ocean.  Ideally situated within walking distance of the beach (5-7 min), surfing, and good restaurants (literally across the street). Guests could walk anywhere or arrange for scooters or very hospitable private drivers from the region through the hotel.

Hotel meals were of high quality and very tasty. Occasional inconsistencies (e.g., same breakfast order prepared differently on different days or ran out of mango). 

In general, the hotel aims to please. From a friendly smile and welcome drink at 1am to a free foot massage by room to not having to worry about personal belongings (unlike some other hotels in the area) - all very appreciated.  I

Take advantage of the local connections at the front desk - from renting a scooter to getting leather workers to visit you at the hotel for your measurements and custom made jacket. I would strongly strongly recommend this hotel for great quality-price value.
title: The Perfect Distance

text:
I've stayed at the Kirana with my boyfriend for out first time in Bali for 9 days...
I liked Canggu cause there's not the crowd of Kuta pr Semyniak so it's definitely better for a relaxing holiday even if the beach is mostly for surfers and you can't really swim there...!!
The Kirana has a really nice staff who tries always to help and it's kind but...at the end of all for what you pay and for being Bali you expect a bit more...
The room was lovely and they kept it clean every day.
What disappointed me a bit were the restaurant... The food in the café around were much more lovely and so much cheaper.. they should adapt their prices to Bali and make it cheaper..
Improving a bit the quality..
 Breakfast was a la Carte.. I rather buffet breakfast but they had this a la carte way. However the food wasn't great again...don't have bacon and eggs avoid it cause it doesn't taste like it should at all (being used to Australian lovely caffè breakfast? Here pancakes and everything else was a bit disappointing...) they should make the portion bigger and study the breakfast menu better.
The pool was lovely but the sun started to cover it a bit late plus there aren't enough beds for all guests around the pool. 
At the end I'll come back to the Kirana,  I'd just avoid eating there...but I'm sure they could improve some things!
title: Nice but....

text:
I stayed here for two nights just after I arrived in Bali before heading elsewhere and it was a perfect stopover. Easy transfer from the airport with a lovely driver. Very beautiful area away from the hustle and bustle of kuta etc. Easy shuttle to seminyak. Beautiful, clean pool. Generally very well maintained. Good restaurant and excellent, small spa.
Would recommend, but I think after a few nights you may wish to move on as there isn't much going on other than pure relaxing.
title: Lovely place

text:
My girlfriend and I had a great 5-day stay at the Kirana! It's close to the beach where there are always a bunch of surfers enjoying the waves. We took walks watching them and then grabbed some food nearby.

There are a ton of restaurants within walking distance. Be sure to check out Betelnut, Old Man's, Lacalita, Crate and the grill at Echo beach.

We also did horseback riding along the beach that was a bit expensive but fun.

The staff at Kirana is the best of all! They are so friendly and helpful. 

I highly recommend spending some time at the Kirana if you'll be in Bali. Enjoy!
title: Great staff, beautiful area

text:
Beautiful, new, charming hotel in walking distance to the beautiful beach, local restaurants and shopping.  Although there is not much to do in Canggu if you do not surf, this hotel is excellent and very comfortable.  The service is outstanding. They offered to prepare a lovely take-away breakfast for me since my deaparture time 3 days later was at 5:00AM. 
Highly recommended.
title: Excellent

text: I spent two weeks at the Kirana Resort and Spa.  It was as close to perfect as I can imagine.  The location was perfect for me.  It was quiet and not crowded. Five minute stroll to the beaches.  Walking distance to many very good restaurants.  But the food at the Kirana was so good, many evenings I did not go out to eat.  My package included the breakfast and it was delicious and there was so much food I never ate lunch, but would have a light snack around 2:00. The staff at the Kirana were always pleasant and friendly.  They spoke excellent English and always exceeded expectations.  The shuttle into Seminyak was a terrific free benefit offered and taken.  My bed at the Kirana was better than the last 5 star hotel I was at the week before. I highly recommend this Hotel. I hope to be back there soon.
title: Bali Holiday

text: We chose to stay at Kirana after friends recommended the hotel. Booked 3 nights and ended up staying another 8. Close to surf, good restaurants, clean and comfortable rooms. Pool access room really nice to step straight out of and onto a sunbed. Breakfast was really tasty and plentiful. Would stay again!
title: Friendly boutique hotel close to beach

text: I was going to stay for 2 days... ended up 6!  Very relaxed and friendly place with a good mix of solo travelers, couples and friend groups and a mix of ages.  It is not super quiet, but also not noisy. The staff of course are fabulous! They offer bikes and rides in the local area. Lots of great restaurants around. Very nice experience all around
title: Great for solo traveler!

text:
We choose to book our stay at The Kirana based on the hotels reviews on TripAdvisor. We totally agree with the hotels excellent reviews. 

The breakfast and the hotels restaurants menu had a lot of varieties and was very good. The room was clean, and the interior was very tasty and looks very nice. 

The hotel has an very relaxed atmosphere, and the infinity pool is very nice.

The spa treatments are very nice, especially the traditional balinese massage was very good! 

All of the personal was very service oriented and always smiling!    

I can strongly recommend the hotel. And we are definitely coming back! :)
title: We had a lovely stay at The Kirana hotel

text: We definitely loved The Kirana Hotel!!!! We loved how comfortable the beds were, how swiftly the check in and check out were done, the warm service of the staff, the ambiance, everything about the hotel we loved except for a few minor things! Since we were travelling as a group, it was a bit awkward that from the outside you could see what a person is doing inside the bathroom. So for a group, it would be a bit uncomfortable for you to take a shower and do your business when people can see you. I hope they can address this issue like improving the curtains that cover the CR window --  just remembered also that the bath/shower area is not fully covered, meaning if you're taking a shower, water will splatter all over the CR. One time the floor was flooded because there was no walls/curtains to contain water splashes. But we definitely loved our room! It had a nice view of the pool and the bed was really comfortable. :) We also loved that they have bikes for rent for free! The hotel is probably a 5-10min to Batu Bolong beach in Canggu. Which on a humid day in Bali would be draining and tiresome! Fortunately they have bicycles for rent for free which made our morning surf session more comfortable. :) I just wished these bikes were well maintained. They also offer motorbike rentals (for a minimum fee of IDR 50,000 this is definitely cheaper than rental in Kuta of IDR 100,000). They also have free transfers to certain areas but we weren't able to maximize this because we had a good driver with us (Deni from YourBaliDriver.com). We loved our stay here, we will definitely come back. :) The staff were very attentive, patient, accommodating and warm to us versus of another 4 star hotel in Kuta! Loved everything about this hotel except the CR :D food was okay, it's just plated meal. In general, you get more than what you pay for. I hope they don't increase prices anytime soon. :D
title: Best hotel in Canggu - Felt like our home

text:
We spent 13 days at this hotel and had the most wonderful experience. Hotel is not located in the cleanest area but the grounds are immaculate. Staff are very friendly and helpful. The new chef is amazing - even cooked our group of 8 a special 5 course meal for $17 each. We ate most of our meals at the hotel because the quality was excellent as was the variety.Spa was great, pool was great and the rooms very comfortable. No complaints at all!
Hotel provided free transportation in to town for shopping  plus free airport shuttle.Would definitely stay at this hotel again.
title: Beat vacation in Bali

text:
I stayed 1 week with my girlfriend. The hotel was fantastic, beatifull reception, big rooms and big and comfortable bed. 
The location was perfect, near the beach (surfer beach), in a small town, not far away from seminyak or kerobokan and with a lot of small restaurants with local and western food in the zone, like  Ithaka Warung(our favourite)
 Nothing wrong in these days.
thanks to the staff who helped us in everything we need.
title: Great place, great zone

text: I am currently staying at this hotel while writing this review and couldn't be happier.  Walked up without a reservation to see what type of deal I could get.  They gave me a ocean view with breakfast each day for 2 and dinner for 2 one night, 15 minute welcome massage, free taxi around canggu and I beleive into seminyak but haven't tried that yet for 75$ a night with all taxes and fees.   Nice big room, king bed and excellent service. Tomorrow I will try a full massage at the spa which is  9$ for an hour.  Sure you can stay up the street for 16$ and that's great, but the service, cleanliness, extra space, balcony with view of the ocean, free breakfast and upscale feel of this place is worth the extra 60 dollars while traveling with my lady.  I would probably spring for it even if I was by myself after seeing what this place has to offer.  This is great value and I'm sure during peak season you can't just walk up and get this rate but I have no desire to come here when everyone does so for me this is a winner.  I probably could have bargained my way down even more but this seemed to be a  super fair price.  If this was in Hawaii or Florida this room would easily cost 300-500 a night.  Can't say enough about how polite and welcoming the staff is.  Do yourself a favor and stay here.
title: Great spot with a great staff.

text: Going to Bali first time was  really nice experience.Canggu area was quiet ,hotel close to beach.We stayed in Kirana with my husband for 4 nights in Kirana Suite,this was big 2 rooms  suite ,perfect ,clean  and  we fill there like paradise.Staff working was very nice ,polite,excellent.Hotel breakfast had geat variety.The all meals was tasty,pizza amazing.Everyone and everything in Kirana hotel was fabulous.Thank you to all staff .we will be back
title: Exsellent

text:
We stayed on the top floor, the bigger rooms, and found the hotel very good. Clean, new, and all that you could want. Wouldn't wanted to have stayed on the ground floor because the pool and restaurant patrons can view your comings and goings. Your entry door faces the above ground pool. 
The food is excellent. Made, the chef, was a finalist on Indo Masterchef, and creates wonderful delicious  dishes of various genre's.
3 min walk to the beach, clean ocean, great waves, no hawkers, cheap scooter, 30min ride to Seminyak for a night out, had a ball!!!
title: Excellent

text:
The hotel is clean and charming! I think it is an amazing deal! Also the breakfast was out of this world :)

The staff was welcoming and helpful. I would stay here again!

The location is only a 5 minute walk to the beach however the beach is best for surfing not laying out! If you want to surf this is an amazing hotel!
title: Such an adorable hotel!!

text: Going to Bali, the last thing I expected was staying in a place like this. Of course, I had heared about the hospitality of the balinese People, but being presented with that in a context of high level, professional hotel environment kind of blew my mind;-) Everything, starting from the subtle, but reliable service, the regularly cleaned, beautiful rooms, the fantastic food provided from the amazing kitchen crew combined with a relaxed and welcoming atmosphere- Stay at the Kirana, if you want to make the most out of your experience in this wonderful part of Bali! Located in the laid back area of Changgu, this is a must-go for everyone, who likes to enjoy a perfect time at very reasonable prices in an amazing place. Thanks to everyone for making me want to come back there again!
title: The unexpected...

text: The Kirana hotel provides an authentic and luxurious Balinese experience at a great value. The hotel is situated in a lush area full of trees and rice fields surrounded by numerous cafes and restaurant. The beach is a mere 10-minute walk away. The suite in which I stayed was spacious and stylish. Having stayed at the Intercontinental Bali resort prior to my stay at the Kirana, I can say that my experience at the Kirana was comparatively more exciting and memorable...at a better price!
title: Excellent, boutique Balinese hotel with 5-star quality

text: We stayed at The Kirana over the Christmas/New Year period. I was reticent about the area and the hotel but all my concerns were laid to rest very quickly. That's because The Kirana and Canggu exemplify the best Bali has to offer. The Kirana's staff are warm, genuine and go out of their way to help. Komeng, Sri, Wira, Putu, Ade, Aiik, Poni and Rima are so committed to doing a good job and making each guests stay the best it can be. The hotel is so calm and welcoming that we felt so relieved to come back there every day. It was lovely reading in the lobby or reception area, lazing by the pool or resting in the room. The spa is wonderful too and incredibly good value. But get in early because it is popular and you need to book ahead. We had breakfast included which like anywhere does become repititive. That's no fault of The Kirana's. I like that they don't have a wasteful breakfast banquet and there are many breakfast options close by when you need some variety.  We stayed for nine days so it wasn't as if we only had one or two nights. Even after that time it was hard to leave because Canggu is still semi-rural still with many restaurant, cafe, spa and shopping options. There's none of the mad traffic and mayhem that has bled into Seminyak and Kerobakan. So at the end of your holiday you return home relaxed rather than with a sore head.
title: Like returning home every day

text: It all started with the arranged pick up at the airport. The driver was on time and brought us to the hotel late in the evening. The hotel feels warm and welcome, and the crew just makes it better. The rooms are perfect and the bed is the best we experienced during our trip. The breakfast is perfect and has a lot of options for many different visitor from different regions. The swimming pool isn't that big and only had sunlight during the middle of the day, but who cares! You're like 5 minutes away (walk) from Canngu beach and another 15 from Echo beach. By the way: visit the Pirate bar at Echo, really worth a visit for some lunch. Last but not least: the hotel has a new chef which really tries to change the standards. He is a top chef which really could make this hotel top of the bill. Keep it going like this people!
title: The best during our stay at Bali!

text:
I stayed at The Kirana with my fiancé for 4 nights. Lynda was amazing from the first point of our booking process. Our needs and requirements were met by Lynda and all her staff. The hotel location is perfect. Cafés, beaches and shops are on your door step. The hotel breakfast had great variety, you order anything you like from the menu, ranging from eggs to pancakes and fruit. The rooms are modern and are wrapped around the pool. Our room wasn't available at time of check in so we were lucky enough to stay in the penthouse for 2 nights. The penthouse was pure paradise, we had our own plunge pool overlooking over beautiful rice fields. If you have the money to splurge or are staying for a special occasion I would recommend the penthouse. Once moving to our other room we were pleasantly surprised, we booked a pool access room so we could jump straight into the pool! The beds were very comfortable.
No complaints here! Our friends stayed at a hotel up the road for triple what we paid and they hated there hotel. I am so glad we chose to pay less because the Kirana was fabulous! You can't go wrong with price and what you get. 

Thankyou Kirana, we will be back :)
title: Amazing Hotel in perfect location with exceptional service.

text: Nice hotel with beautiful view, only 10 minutes away from the beach. Free bike to ride and beautiful scenery with a small rice field at front, not 100% concrete building with other hotels in general..
title: Nice Place to stay by the Canggu Beach

text: My wife and I booked a pre Christmas getaway and found this little gem.  Its 20 minutes taxi up from seminyak and just a 5 minute walk from echo beach.  The hotel is very well appointed and is only about a year old.  The rooms are quite well appointed and roomy. The upper floors have a great view of the ocean and surrounding areas. The hotel staff are welcoming and courteous without being overbearing or intrusive.  The restaurant dining for all meals is of a very high standard and extremely well priced.  They offer a courtesy bus as either a pic up or drop off to the airport but not both.  This was my only fault with the hotel.  That said I would definitely recommend this hotel to couples and families alike.  Try it and see for yourself.  I'm glad I did as i will be going back to this place again.
title: Great place. Incredible staff.

text: Our Christmas with extended family was great in Kirana. Clubhouse was extremely convenient for larger group. Restaurant food was good and especially chef for the Christmas dinner was marvellous. I can recommend this hotel for anyone looking for a good place to stay and wanting to enjoy some peaceful time together
title: Excellent hotel and good food

text:
We really enjoyed our stay here, and there is very little to fault.

Accommodation is 5 minutes walk from the beach, and set back from the road (note - it only has a small sign outside which can easily be missed by taxis).

Rooms overlook the central infinity style pool and have far reaching views to the sea. They are of a high standard with comfortable beds, oversized pillows and soft linen. Bathrooms & shower are decent but the grouting has discoloured (didn't bother us at all). 

Rooms also have a balcony which is a bonus. Satellite tv worked with good signal & western movie channels. Air co also effective and not noisy. 

On arrival you receive a drink & free foot massage voucher which is a nice touch.

There are push bikes available. Wifi streams throughout the hotel, and there is a PC in the lobby.

We had a few snacks from the restaurant which were ok-ish, but we preferred to eat out.

What really sets this hotel apart is the staff. They were exceptionally friendly and helpful with a good sense of humour.

We had to leave at 6.30am for a ferry to the gili islands so they arranged for the chef to come in early to cook us breakfast. Definitely went the extra mile to please!!

Represents outstanding value for money & had a great stay. Couldn't recommend more highly.
title: Fantastic stay

text:
I had the absolute pleasure of staying at the Kirana Bali for an entire month.
As I was studying a very intense course near by,I needed somewhere I could come home to and relax at the end of some very stressful days with assignments, exams etc.
The staff at Kirana did every thing possible to minimise my stressors, from making sure I would get my hot breakfast every day (as my course required I leave before the kitchen opened) to running errands, picking up shopping for me & even driving me to the Drs when I was sick and coming back to pick me up in the early hours of the morning and making sure I had all the supplies I needed to get better.After one month with the beautiful staff they began to feel like family and the Kirana truly felt like my home in bali.When my husband came to visit me for only 3 days the staff from reception helped me to organise some unforgettable dates to make the most of the short time we had.My favourite was sunset horseriding along the beach,it was very romantic and the photographs I will cherish forever.We also enjoyed the 2hour pamper package at the Kirana Spa which includes body massage,scrub and mask as well as a facial,using divine products.The kitchen has a great selection of meals and make the best pavlova I have ever had, there are also many quality but very affordable restaurants with in meters walking distance from the Kirana.The beach is only a 2min walk and there are 2 other beaches also with in walking distance.The Kirana has a gorgeous gym and I found it perfect for a short daily weights session.I would highly recommend the Kirana to singles,couples and families.I stayed in the deluxe sea view which was absolutely Devine,the view was amazing and you could hear the waves crashing on the beach,it has evry thing you would expect to find in a five star hotel and it was lovely to relax in the bath tub after a long day of study.on the days of check in and check out I stayed in the deluxe pool access room and it was stunning also (I would recommend this if you intend to spend the days relaxing poolside).
I would advise travellers to make any required arrangements in the day time with the assistance of reception (especially a beautiful lady called Ade, her English is superb and she is so very kind & helpful) as in the evening the boys at reception are still lovely but English is not as good if you have finer details to go thro.So if it is important organise it in the daytime, that said evening staff always tried their absolute best usually worked out what I was trying to say eventually :)
I also found that if there is any communication issues just speak slowly,be polite and keep smiling you get a lot further than if you are are short tempered and rushed -good advice when speaking to any locals in bali.
I would also advise travellers to email the Manager Dewa if you have any special requests or requirements as he is very helpful and flexible and will do everything to make sure any requests are accommodated for, as he did with my breakfast arrangements etc.
I can not wait to return to my home in Bali.I hope to see you there.
title: A month in paradise

owner_response.text:
Dear Kitty T,

Greetings from your family in Bali!
Thank you for your worth sharing! we are happy to be part of your one month journey.
definitely will keep in improving the standard of the team and service at The Kirana Bali.
We value your feedback and our warmest greetings from us, Dewa and Ade, too.

Hope to welcoming you back home again soon! ^_^

sincerely,
Komang D.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I am so pleased with the Kirana the friendly staff were so refreshing.  The location is amazingly close to everything, restaurants cafes, beach and Echo beach as well. The hotel is almost new and well appointed. The price is also excellent. I will be back there very soon with my family.
title: Ideal Location and Great staff

owner_response.text:
Dear Ginstaboy,

Greetings from sunny Canggu!

Thank you for your kindly feedback. 
The restaurants cafe, echo beach, beach are looking forward to having you and your family in your return visit.
Please stay in touch!

warm hi from the happy staffs!
xxx
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We booked this hotel as we were looking for a quiet place to stay. We found it. The Kirana is located in a quiet area of Canngu with the beach just a short walk down the road. Our room was clean and the beds extremely comfortable. We ate at the hotel as walking on the streets is dangerous due to no footpaths however cafes and restaurants are not too far away. The food was of a reasonable quality however it sometimes arrived a little cold but this would be our only complaint. The music played in the Koi restaurant was a little loud and very repetitive. The staff were very friendly and always went out of their way to help and provide us with information and assistance. The spa staff provided an excellent service. I came away from our stay at the Kirana much relaxed and refreshed.
title: Nice hotel, quiet location

owner_response.text:
Dear Kerry O,

Thank you for your reviews.
we noted on the feedback in regards to the music, and we've found that it was bit loud as you've shared, and immediately taken the action and  this has been adjusted accordingly. Thank you for your care :)
we and the staff are so much looking forward to see you soon again.

please stay in touch :)
from the heart of Canggu - Bali
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Booked this because found the idea of being in a peaceful setting away from the buzz of Kuta and other busier areas tempting. Ended up spending unnecessarily much time in taxis, so, in retrospect, accepting a less quiet location would seem to have been a better idea.
The location seems to be very good for surfing, as the (not really attractive) beach is only about 500 meters away, and the Canggu beach waves seem to be better than at Kuta (which seems to be for beginners.) Other than that, there was not much useful in the immediate vicinity of the hotel: the choice of restaurants is narrow, and the drive or ride to elsewhere was always 30+ minutes. The most interesting stuff found here but not in Kuta were lots and lots of rice paddies, and a dozen of cows along the road to the beach.

The hotel itself is quite good. We paid a good sum of money for a suite with a separate bedroom, with nice floors and furniture and a very good bath room. The only issues we had were that there was a some sand on the floor (mainly living area) when we arrived and it did not get cleaned during our 3 night stay, and the bath tub drained very very slowly (Probably sand! This kind of things should be checked by the cleaning staff regularly, and not left to the guests to complain). At the price level we paid we felt that cleaning and maintenance should have been at a completely different level!
There was a small gap under the door to the corridor (which is open air), and a number of largish insects crawled in in the evening and night. Not a big deal, but would probably be easy to fix.
TV was newish and largish flat screen, but TV reception was poor, with lots of noise on most channels. Internet was occasionally very slow, but usually worked.
Breakfast options were good (not a buffet, but order a la carte from a number of good alternatives.)
title: Reasonable hotel, remote location

text:
The Kirana is located in a very pleasant part of Canggu, with the beach close by and plenty of nice places to eat.
The rooms are nice and with plenty of space, even when travelling with 3 surf boards, but already show some signs of wear, despite only being open since April 2014. The beds were the highlight, as these are extremely comfortable.
It also provides a nice pool, with some limited space around it but still nice place to chill.
The staff was always very helpful and we felt very easy to ask for anything at the hotel, even advice on where to rent motorbikes was available.

Unfortunately it needs some simple improvements to make it an ideal place to stay. The room cleaning was never done until very late in the day. I think over a period of 20 days our room was only already cleaned before lunch time twice. This is a little bit of a nuisance as waking up very early for surf, means we were ready for a snooze after lunch, but this was rarely possible as we had to wait for the room to be cleaned or ask the reception for this to be done.
Not only the timing of the cleaning was wrong, but the level of the cleaning was very poor. Our room towards the end of the stay just smelled terrible as the bathroom was not cleaned properly, toilet paper was rarely replaced and the bedding was left a few days too long before changing, even when requested to be done, it seemed to be ignored. 
This is one of the basic requirements in a hotel of this level.
Also the restaurant left much to be desired, the breakfast was very pointless. It seemed the restaurant was trying to advertise itself more, by promoting live music and traditional music. If they had enough space to do this, it would be fine, but with the arrangement of the hotel, the noise was pretty loud in the room.

Also in case the hotel management is reading, seems many places in Bali offer drinking water refills for free, this is a measure to try to reduce the usage of plastic bottles, would be nice if hotels like this were part of this in order to try to reduce the pollution issue in Bali. 

It certainly is a nice spot to be for a short stay.
title: A nice spot for a short stay

text: I can't say enough about this beautiful hotel.  Not only was it affordable but luxurious, quiet and tranquil yet on the main road of Canggu.  Delicious breakfast and dinner choices, incredibly comfy bed and well appointed suite.  I loved my balcony overlooking the pool which also had a great view of the ocean.  Every morning I would wake up early to have breakfast and take a bike ride down to Canggu Beach.  Every day was heaven!!
title: Beyond Perfect!

owner_response.text:
Dear SurfBee09,

Good morning,

Thank you for your kindly share for a beyond perfect stay with us :)
Happy to know that you are enjoying the stay and much looking forward for you or your friends future visit. 

Please stay in touch and always feel free to contact us directly for any assistance we can be of.

Komang
rm@thekiranabali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We really enjoyed our stay at Kirana Hotel & Spa. Very nice smaller type room but with everything you need including good a/c. Lovely fresh cooked breakfast choices each morning, no buffet!  Staff helpful & friendly apart from the cartridge in printer at reception was not fixed over 4 days of being there & any area maps info or receipts were not printed out which would have been more convenient. The spa was very good & reasonably priced & we used this several times but please fix the speaker in the roof, as it takes away from the relaxing background music. Small but lovely pool to cool off in but there needs to be just a few more chairs around for guests, even the small type that are on balconies would be sufficient (just a suggestion as lounges are taken quickly) The bicycles are excellent for guests to use but would just suggest: either front basket or a back carrier on all bikes not just both on 2 bikes! The others need something as well. We thoroughly enjoyed cycling all over Canggu & ended up hiring cycles just up & across the road from the hotel so we could use them everyday. Great way to find restaurants & explore Echo beach area. Safe to get around as traffic is a lot less in Canggu.
title: Lovely small hotel & spa in Canggu only 1 year old!

text: The Kirana is a real find - I stayed 2 nights solo and my room overlooked a nice pool and was clean, spacious and had everything a 4-star hotel has but at really great prices. Nice staff, friendly and clean, and in a perfect location. The only thing I would say is that you can't order a normal local taxi from this area as there is a Canguu-wide ban, which makes going into Seminyak or anywhere else difficult unless you have your own transport. Also, there was quite a lot of loud music in the general reception and restaurant - I think most people would like less of this....The breakfast, as many have said already, is not great - it would be nice to just be able to choose from an al a carte list. Saying this, this is a really nice good value option in the area if you need somewhere comfortable for a night or two.
title: Great hotel for a great price

text: Very nice place with very nice staff. We stayed almost a week and everything was good except the breakfast which is not as good as the hotel standard. The hotel is clean and the staff helpful. It is located in a calm area very near to the beach and surrounded by a lot a place where to eat.
title: Good Hotel

text: We my daughter in law and me went to Bali to see my grandchildren, who were surfing there. We wanted to be close to them and the Kirana was the closest choice. We really liked our stay there and even decided to stay one week extra. Beach was close, a lot of restaurangs just minutes away. In afternoons my grandchildren prefered to stay at poolside of our hotel.
title: the kirana hotel resto and spa.

text: Loved the place, modern, clean rooms, helpful and friendly staff, close to the beach, lots of cafe's and eating options all within walking distance. My only complaint was not enough breakfast options, next time I stay I wont take breakfast in my package as the cafe's around the area offer much better menu's. But having said that I would definitely stay again and can highly recommend The Kirana.
title: Relaxed and layed back, excellent staff

text:
My partner and I recently stayed for ten days at the Kirana..first night in the penthouse, then a deluxe suite..and finally a deluxe ocean view room.. 
The hotel is situated in a very good location.. Close to all eateries and beaches.. It has an amazing moat full of huge koi..we were welcomed by a lovely girl with a huge friendly smile whom showed us to our room.. Staff are amazing.. After eating a set menu for breakfast for two days we decided to venture out and explore.. Close by are wonderful organic eateries, A French coffee/patisserie cafe and of course Deus.. My recommendation to Kirana would be mindful of the style of music they play.. It's a place where people search for a chilled experience..also need to look at providing a few more sun lounges.. Otherwise a totally fantastic stay..
title: Relaxing place to stay..

text:
We stayed for 7 nights and enjoyed our stay, the staff were fantastic, the rooms were clean and had everything we needed, the spa was well priced for the area and the Kirana was close to alot of the great places to eat or go for a drink - although I would definitely recommend hiring a scooter or car to get around Canggu. 
The downside to Kirana is the location of the pool and lack of areas to sit and relax, for this reason the hotel feels empty most of the time and therefore lacks a vibe or atmosphere that so many other places in the area have. It is great if you just want accommodation to sleep in but are planning to be out and about exploring the rest of the time.
title: Great hotel and staff but lacking atmosphere

text:
so thankfull we chose Kirana, we had 4 children with us and we all loved it, rooms were immaculate and modern, staff were helpfull .... One place we will book again for sure ...
We had a few problems with the spa, my friend (female) and I had a massage in same room to finish, they ran a flower bath to watch the sun set, BUT they expexted us both to hop in together a regular size bath, just a little close for comfort, we are friends not partners .... Other than that highly recomend ....
title: Perfect little place

text:
We spent 5 nights in Kirana hotel before going to Ubud. Staff is very friendly and super helpful. Rooms are nice, all with a little balcony. Silent aircon, great bed. Bathroom is basic but good enough. Despite some crying baby's in the early mornings in the hallway, I had a good sleep.
Pool is very small and if you don't have a room at the pool.... forget about having a seat. Wifi is also not working in the rooms (signal not strong enough). 
Kirana is super well located and walking distance from the beach, Old Man bar, Deus, Kaki Lima, etc. Bikes are available at the hotel and we also rented scooters at 50k rp per day to discover the area. Taxi is advisable to go to Seminyak.
title: Very well located

photos.caption: View from corner room at 2nd floor

text:
Located few minutes from Surfers paradise and Echo beaches, this new hotel, offers comfort and style. 
Decoration is modern, simplistic and based on naturalistic principles.
The rooms are spacious and modern, all coming with a balcony. 
The breakfast was good, though with a limited choice. 
They have bikes available for the guests (first come, first served), which comes quite handy to move around in Canggu.
The staff was very professional and friendly, providing great tips on places to eat in the area.
