title: Modern hotel

text:
We stayed for 3 nights and it was wonderful!  A short walk to the beach where there are places to eat and all kinds of surfing.  The vibe was definitely a surfer paradise vibe but there were people of all ages and nationalities there.

The staff at the hotel were tremendous! They were very quick to help in any way possible.  It was also great to still see the Balinese culture peeking out in the midst of so many tourists that did not even attempt to use the local language and were, at times, quite demanding.  

We utilized the laundry service and were very pleased.  We also used the spa services and were delighted to have both services right there on the premises with such great service.

We will stay again!
title: Great place!

text: Stayed five night there, had one of the best long sleep ever,  very quiet, clean.... one of the most important fact for me, and with the great mattress and pillow. Done deal!!! will come back for sure. Walking distance to the beach and still got the Richfield in the same time plus, there is a nice lounge also bar+restaurant next to the beach..perfect. And one more, do little bit sport in the morning with the beautiful view from the gym. With all the fact and great price, the service etc. Just keep it that way, I will come back all the time.
title: got a good sleep

text:
The rooms a great quality with good quality beds, pillows and linen.  The hotel is new with modern design, although the bathroom tiles already look tired, this could be due to humidity or poor maintenance.  The pool is great and the location is fantastic, such a short walk to the beach.  We found the Hotel has a particularly friendly atmosphere amongst guests, this is reflective of Canggu as an area which is laid back, beach town vibe.  

Loved the free access to bikes, welcome massage and helpful staff.  The spa is very good quality, there are cheaper options down the road but are not of the same quality.

The only thing the hotel lacks is a quality restaurant, the breakfast is okay.  The dinner menu is also alright but the prices do not reflect the quality of the food.  However, there are plenty of other dinner options within walking distance.  The hotel is also experimenting with some late night entertainment events that I am not sure fit the scope of what travellers are looking for, it also meant putting up with loud club music from 6pm until 11pm on Friday night (rooms are pretty sound proof so it is not too bad).  I think this is a teething process until they work out what kind of events/activities are popular.  In the mean time Old Man's bar next to the beach plays fantastic music, and has great food.

I would still recommend this hotel to everyone I know, it really is a fantastic quality hotel, for a great price and a wonderful location.  We hope to come back soon.
title: Great value, high quality

text:
Very nice hotel, in quiet area of Canggu. Delicious breakfast. Very nice gym. Also swimming pool is nice.
Quite close to the beach, about 10 minutes by walk.
Staf very helpful.
Definitely recommend for that price.
title: Very nice hotel

text:
We stayed here for 7 nights and absolutley loved it! We got a good deal and thought there must be some catch, but i simply can't fault this Hotel.
The staff were all very friendly and helpful-with all our requests answered. 
Breakfast was fine with a few options, the pool was gorgeous and the spa very reasonably priced and very relaxing.
We ate dinner at the hotel a couple of times and food was authentic, great tasting and quite suprisingly not hotel food prices.
The rooms were cleaned to a high standard everyday, not to mention the most comfortable bed i have ever slept in!
Hotel is in a good location, about a 5min walk to the beach, and hotel can arrange scooter hire, as Canggu is a perfect place to hire a scooter.
title: Wonderful friendly Hotel in a perfect location!

text: I stayed here for 9 nights.  The staff were very friendly and helpful.  Good basic breakfast.  The hotel is a 5 minute walk from the beach but set in a quiet area.  It's a good choice if you want value for money plus a quiet place to relax.  Went to the spa every night.  The massages were excellent and the spa staff were well trained, friendly and accommodating to your needs.  The room was large enough and most had a good view of the ocean.  I would definitely stay at the Kirana again.  Thanks for a great holiday!
title: Great resort!

text: We try and review nearly all our travel activity but very nearly didn't write a review for The Kirana cause we don't want anyone else to know about it. We want it to be available every time we want to go there! Found it on a travel brokers site and the first thing we noticed was an amazing price so researched further. It very nearly fell into the 'too good to be true' bracket so we were initially concerned about what the catch was going to be but there seriously wasn't one. From the moment we arrived we could not have been treated better. The property is really unique with the reception area located away from the actual accommodation complex. We had a room on the second floor overlooking the pool with a west facing balcony to take advantage of the amazing sunsets. The room wasn't huge but was more than adequate and the bathroom was terrific. Seeing the hotel is quite small (30 rooms) breakfast isn't the traditional buffet style but is actually cooked as it's ordered. The three options are Indonesian, American and The Kirana Special with the latter ending up being our favourite. The dinner menu isn't huge but there's enough options and there are numerous cafes and restaurants within walking distance. Old Man's Beach is a five minute walk and the pub there is a good spot for a drink and a meal in an unbelievably relaxed atmosphere. All in all we couldn't rate the Kirana higher and fully intend to visit there again in the future. P.S. Best Free WiFi we've ever found anywhere!
title: Absolute Hidden Gem

text:
Me and my boyfriend have stayed in the Kirana for 9 nights. When we have arrived we received a complementary drink. The manager explained everything to us. The biggest advantage of this hotel is the staff. No where else in the world I have met such a nice personnel.  

The hotel is very new. We have stayed in the pool access suite. It was very specious with a large living room, bedroom and bathroom. We were expecting that it might be loud since the pool was next to the suite but it was the total opposite. The bed was extremely comfortable.

The restaurant serves three types of breakfast. Which are very diverse. The dinner menu is delicious especially the spring rolls. Great selection of cocktails. 

The spa is great value for money. Very professional. There is a large selection of massage oils and body scrubs. Tea is served after the massage.

The Kirana is about 20km away from Kuta. I think the location in which the hotel is, is ideal. The taxi to Kuta costs about 100K rupee but a drop off service from the hotel is avialable at 10am and 2pm to Seminayak. It is a great gateway from the tourist areas such as Kuta or Legian but those areas are still easily accessible.
title: Excellent hotel

text: Recently stayed at The Kirana for four nights in one of the suite rooms which was great with lots of space and a separate lounge area. Staff at the front desk was very helpful from the check in on and throughout the whole stay. Good basic breakfast with a choice of American, Indonesian or Kirana Special. Batu Bolong beach is about 5 min walk away from the hotel. Its a black sand beach and unfortunately has a bit of rubbish around. There are a few nice coffee shops and restaurant down the road form the hotel (check out the French patisserie). The hotel offers free bike hire which is great to explore the surroundings. Also the hotel offers a free drop off only transfer to Seminyak which is about 20-30min drive away depending on the traffic. The Kirana is a nice place for a few relaxing and quiet days away.
title: Small, new hotel in a quiet location

text:
We started our holiday around Bali here for 3 nights. Very friendly staff and a very helpfull hotel manager who welcomes her new guests and gives you all the information you need. The hotel is a 5min walk of canngu beach, where you have some Nice restaurants/bars. The beach however has few facilities and black sand. Canggu is ideal for a few days, especially if you want to (try) surf, but that's it.

We Had an ocean view room which was Nice and clean with a good bed. The bathroom however was less clean and our toilet was not working properly. They fixed it when we complained about it though. For the breakfast you can choose between american, indonesion or kirana special, basically they're all pretty much the same ( eggs, toast, fruit, juice,..) so not much variaty, which is ok if you don't stay too long like us.
 Nice extra's: free bicycle use(upon availability), free transfer to seminyak (only drop-off).  

Conclusion: in general a good hotel, if you don't pay more than €50/night and wouldn't recommend to stay longer then a few days.
title: Good value for money

text: We stayed there for three nights to relax after the Bromo,Ijen tour. The hotel is close to the beach and in a quiet environement. The beach gives the option of surfing for all levels. The rooms in the hotel are clean and neat with a good wifi connection. The staff is very professional and friendly. We allmost ever eat at the hotel restaurant, because the food there is delicious. The only downside is the bathroom floor, which did allways get flooded if you took a shower and did not drain. But overall it was a perfect relaxing stay.
title: A relaxing stay with a good surfing possibility

text: The Kirana is a great little hotel in Canggu, walking distance to the Batu Bolong beach (a good longboarding wave for surfers) and walking distance to several restaurants (Betelnut Cafe is amazing) and a couple spas. The staff was super friendly and helpful, and the food in the restaurant was better than expected. Overall a great experience.
title: Great Hotel

text: Stayed here for 5 nights, beautiful decor, relaxing environment and extremely comfortable room with all the modern facilities you could want. We were collected from the airport by the hotel's car, quite a relief given the uncertainty of trying to get a taxi. A beautiful eternity pool, free wifi and delicious food. Also, it's a short walk to the beach, where you can surf or swim, or just relax with a nice drink or some food at the lovely little cafe beside it. Two minor criticisms, the window in the bathroom, you are on view to anyone in your main room area. There is a curtain but it doesn't give much privacy at all. Unnecessary feature. Secondly, rather loud music blaring out a few mornings from the dining area, could hear it quite clearly in my room, even though I requested a quiet room. I don't mind a bit of music, but Lady Gaga pumping at 7 am was a little too much. But other than that I would highly recommend staying here. The staff are extremely helpful and so polite and friendly, they made our stay wonderful. There is also a spa facility within the hotel, offering massages and treatments. I never tried it but my partner said it was fantastic, and really cheap. I would definitely stay here again.
title: Excellent

text: The staff is great! Kirana is very fresh and nice rooms, the area around Kirana is very good with lots of things to do. We rented a motorcykle from Kirana, wich was very cheap and a good way to get around canggu and other places, not so much traffic around Kirana. It is close to the beach, wich was great. The only thing that was a little annoying, was about the musiclist in the resturant, it was the same songs all over, and if you live in a poolacces the music is a little high in the mornings. Othervise, we really liked Kirna a lot! And can really recommend it!
title: Nice and clean hotel with great staff.

text: We stayed 5 nights at the Karana in Canggu it was such a nice change from UBUD's bustling town centre.  The staff at the Karana were very friendly especially SRI she organised a special suprise for my birthday which made my stay extra special.  The food was okay more selections would of been better my husband and I are foodies so our expectations are a lot higher as we value nourishing the body with good food and nourishing the outside of your body too.  The Spa looked very nice on arrival the view from spa was awesome you could see a clear view of the beach.  The treatment was okay again we had previously had some of the best spa treatments in UBUD before we came to the Karana so again we felt the spa needed further training with regards to their technique and smoothness.  The pool was very nice it's right in the middle of all the accomodation.  The shuttle bus to Seminyak is an awesome addition the driver knows the back streets so it was such a nice relief to get away from the busy traffic. We stayed in the suite room, it was very nice, nice and spacious. Great size bathrooms, very comfortable beds and yes amazing pillows!!!! One little recommendation is supply a wardrobe to put your clothing in would of made it excellent!!!! Overall great place to stay, there were so many great little places to eat in walking distance to the resort that are worth just to stay in Canggu area!!!! Nice hotel I would definately come back there!!!
title: Great Location away from the hustle and bustle of Bali

text: The staff made this hotel so special.  They were a delight.  The rooms comfortable, fabulous bed and the best pillows I've ever experienced.  The value for money at this hotel is outstanding.  The spa staff were excellent and also good value - my skin is still happy two weeks post facial.  The only thing to watch for is that the rooms have very little space so you virtually can't unpack.  Not a big deal all in all - just pack lightly. I'd highly recommend a few nights at The Kirana.
title: Great find

text: We stayed at the Kirana for four nights. The pool is really nice, staff is incredibly friendly and helpful, rooms are rather clean and the price is good, as we paid about 35 $ per person per night. We have also booked a wonderful massage at the hotel. The breakfast could use some quality improvents. Other than that, we were very happy with our stay. The beach is in 5 min walking distance, as well are nice restaurants and shops close by. One has to get used to walking on the road since there are no pedestrian walkways like anywhere in bali.
title: Cool and clean

photos.caption: Unprofessional smartphone pic from the pool area. It looks way nicer in real life!

text: The staff were super helpful and friendly. The room clean and well appointed. wifi was really weak in my first floor room so I upgraded by $10 and moved poolside which was nicer and had great signal! It's one of the best locations and close to all the best hangs and the beach. It's not a big hotel so has a nice vibe.
title: Close to the beach and a cosy clean hotel

text: We were looking for a quiet location where we could relax for 5 days. Our stay at Kirana gave us this and more. Our suite was stylish, yet still very Bali and very comfortable. We had a pool room which meant we had easy access and used it every day. The staff are fantastic! Nothing is too much trouble. We enjoyed being able to walk down to Canggu beach and Echo beach. There are great places to eat and get great coffee within walking distance. My husband took advantage of the free hotel bikes and rode to Echo Beach a few times.
title: Relaxing Stay

text: It won't be long before this new hotel gets popular, we were so lucky to stay here while it is just new & not many people staying we had the place to ourselves most of the time. The suite room is fantastic value for money. The staff are caring. It is a short walk to the surf beach & the hip Old Mans bar & restaurant and Kakilima by the Sea, Betelnut organic restaurant and a 5 minute drive to the famous Echo Beach. Very relaxing part of Bali we had a great time & the staff were fantastic with our small children. Thank you Kirana :)
title: Great stay at a new hotel

photos.caption: Looking back into restaurant from pool

text: I've stayed at the Kirana 4 times in the past 6 months. It's in a great position and the staff make the stay so enjoyable. They are friendly, kind and generous. The staff will give you advice and cater to your every need. I've stayed in the standard room, the ocean view and the pent house. The rooms are exactly as advertised and you get what you pay for. It's a beautiful spot and I can't make any complaints. I will be staying at the Kirana for many years to come.
title: Kirana Bliss

text: I had a really nice and relaxing stay in this hotel, I can't understand a single bad review. I stayed for two nights in the deluxe room with seaview, the bed was huge and very comfortable, lots of pillows, big balcony, good roomservice. In the bathroom you find shampoo, bodylotion, toothbrush and all the other stuff you need. Towels and sheets smelled very nice. And I really liked the design of the room and bathroom. The hotel itself has a very nice design, the restaurant is next to the pool with view to the ricefields. The food is also very good. The staff is just superfriendly and helpfull. They really try to make every wish possible, I even got a welcome massage after check in and a free bike after check out while waiting for my ride to the airport a few hours later. They have a very nice spa with relaxing treatments in a comfortable atmosphere. So I really enjoyed my stay here, wish I could have stayed longer.
title: awesome

photos.caption: poolview from the restaurant at sunset

text: My family and I had a wonderful stayed at Kirana and highly recommend. We really enjoyed the quiet and spacious atmosphere of the property. The property is very well staff and clean. Everyone there is very helpful and attentive to the guests. We loved the view of the rice fields and beautiful koi fishes at the entrance. They are beautiful! We stayed in Club House villa (4 bedrooms) is contemporary design very spacious - full of comfort with a gorgeous 360 degrees roof top views that one can see the beach and mountain. It has an open plan lay out of living room and kitchen with 12' long island bar. Our private swimming pool is very big and well maintained with fresh towels. We also had a lovely BBQ dinner catered in our villa and the food is delicious with all kind of sea foods. Also their spa also have beautiful view and great service with well price too!
title: Love this place:)

photos.caption: hotel building and hotel dinning and lounge area

text:
Cleaniness: everything was very clean incl: room, food, pool etc..

location: its a great area if ur looking for a surfing location. Otherwose there isnt much to do there. walking distance from the beach, and there are a lot of cafes nearby. Also it's close to an amazing bar and restaurant calles old man.

rooms: were very clean, wished they were a little bigger though. 

Service:  I would say its the best thing about this hotel. the staff were very polite and understanding. They even let us change our booking date without any fees! We also got a complimentary foot massage upon our arrival! And one day we had to leave the hotel v. Early in the morning so we requested if we can have our breakfast before the time it was served, and they helped us out!

Value: we got a great deal from booking.com we also requested an extra bed which was only 20$ per night including breakfast! Amazing deal!
title: Very polite staff!

text:
I was on a honeymoon and they gave us excellent services like free spas , room decoration and bouqets.
I find the price was also very cheap as compared to other hotels.
The beach was nearby.
Excellent room views.
Very good hospitality.
title: Excellent hospitality

text:
I have stayed there twice now in May - it is great for singles who just want to walk to Canggu to surf, go to Old Mans for a drink or watch sunset at KakiLima and then walk back or cycle back with their free bicycles.  Room is all adequate, pool is great, simple.. and there are not many people so its just nice. Its quiet and the greenery around makes it exclusive. good value for money if you get the deals on booking.com! Will definitely stay again and recommend it for all. Even families love it with the rooms just next to pool.  

One tip for Kirana, Can you pls add small towels/ hand towels in your bathroom pls ? You only have bath towels.
title: Kirana is the great location yet private quiet and classy

text:
Kirana was our home away from home. Is a great place located in the more quite area of Changu (i have to say that is not easy to find quite in Bali).

We spend almost a week of our honeymoon in Kirana, and it was really special and romantic.

Great Staff.

I would deffinitely come back again.
title: Great place for our Honney Moon

text:
Been there a few weeks a go. Had a great time white my wife and my 5 months old daughter.
They took care of us very well, the staff were attentive and full of smile.
The pool was nice also, overlooking to green ricefield.
Overall, a very nice and enjoyable experience.
title: New and enjoyable place.

text:
Kirana Team was great! Super friendly, fast service and clean environment. The team (Ena and Irma) specifically was the best! So accommodating, helpful, friendly and BEST smiles in Bali! 😁
Only room for improvement was the drainage and sink.. the sink would always plug up and bathroom floor would accumulate water. Need some service in advanced. 

Thank you!
title: Great experience with great service!

text:
I don't know what the deal is with Canggu but there aren't many hotels in the area, its filled with hostels, homestays and small villas. The Kirana calls itself a four star hotel I can tell you it is nothing of the sort.

The staff are very friendly and great however the hotel is quite dated and doesn't have the four start standards in place (staff, facilities, quality). The bathroom has flies all over the place its disgusting.

The location is very good and central enough to a number of restaurants that is the only positive.

They had a rainstorm during my stay and the water went through the roof so the entire hotel had water all over the place. I went to my room and there is water all over the room floor and bathroom floor this was not great to come back to. When I complained and asked for another room they said there is nothing they can do about it. I would not stay here again.
title: During the Rainstorm there was water seeping in all over the room!

text: After reading all the mixed reviews on this hotel, i was concerned about staying here but the minute i checked in to the hotel all my concerns went away. The room was nice and clean and everything in working order. Staff were also extremely friendly and helpful with any queries. The hotel is well located - the beach is not even a 5 minute walk and lots of shops, places to eat and spas outside your door. I could not fault it in any way.  It is not a 5 star hotel and was never advertised to be but it’s a great hotel in its class. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and would definitely consider the Kirana for any future travel. It was great!
title: Great stay

text:
Filthy hotel. Filthy room with flies coming out of the bathroom sink all day and night. I left the bathroom door closed to minimize the flies in the room. Patio door didn't lock.

Elevator out of service. Paint and construction everywhere once walking up the stairs to the room.

It looks as though some guests may have had decent rooms. I was not one of them.

Nice pool. Good location.

Terrible hotel.
title: Never again

text:
Although both location and staff are great, we would not recommend to stay here (anymore). It seems they didn't do any maintenance during the pandemic. Lot's of leakage and broken furniture in the rooms. 

The loud (live) music at night from the restaurant/bar next door is an issue as well.
title: Needs renovation

text: We stayed at Kirana Canggu for 2 days. Everything was fine and the staff are very friendly and nice. They also set our room as a complimentary. The location is very strategic surrounded by many cafes, shop, etc and it is near the Pantai Batu Bolong (only 400 m from the hotel).
title: Strategic and Nice Place in Canggu

text: I completely don't understand these negative comments.  Kirana turned out to be a great place.  Breakfasts were delicious, the pool very large, the rooms nice and clean, and the most important are ... PEOPLE WHO WORK HERE!  THE GREATEST PEOPLE IN THE WORLD!  I loved this place at first sight and I will definitely want to come back here.  I love you Kiran ❤️
title: Kirana - THE BEST

text: Booked twice in this hotel in  a week's time,  as i was really impressed with the hotel and staff. The location is perfect and close to everything, 5 mins walk to the beach, old mans and the lawn. Spa service was fantastic. The staff were amazing, always smiling and making sure you have a good stay. I loved spending my time with them at the reception. Booked a suite room in my first visit and stayed for 3 nights and after my 2 days trip to nusa penida i booked the suite again. The rooms are big and very spacious. Comfortable beds. Shout out to the reception staff. Lovely stay and will book again in my next trip
title: Suite 205 and 105

text: The hotel is situated near the Canggu Beach, rooms are clean and the stuff is nice. Swimming pool is very good if you'd like to swim in the evening. Unfortunately near the hotel is a reconstruction going on, so the surrounding is due to this not so nice. The hotel offers 3 kinds of breakfast which is average. Near the hotel is a supermarket and money change, which is good. And also a few minutes walk is a very nice yoga studio Serenity. If you want to stay a few nights in Canggu this is a good choice.
title: A nice hotel for few nights

text:
We booked this as the last leg of our wedding anniversary. I hate having to give a negative review but I hope my feedback can help this place to improve cause I see the potential but can’t justify the price we ended up paying for such place.

We stayed in a Kirana room on the first floor at the end of Nov 2019 for 4 nights. 

Pros: 
- Awesome Location. It’s about a 5-7 min walk to Batu Bolong beach along with many restaurants, cafes and beach clubs along the way 

- Food options were cooked to perfection at the Kirana. For a set breakfast menu, everything was always cooked well and well presented. The mixed satay on the all day dining menu was also delicious 

- Security and Staff were all round kind 

- The Kanaya spa located on level 3 of the Kirana gave a good full body massage service

Cons:
- Rooms were run down. I happened to scratch my leg on a nail that was sticking out of the side wood frame of the bed

- Bathroom appears dirty (mirror mould, what seems to be permanent yellow marks on the inside rim of toilet seats) 

- TV was fuzzy when we first arrived. I ended up telling the front desk about this and they sent their maintenance man to work on it which he did eventually fix after some time

- The website mentions hairdryer as one of their amenities on their website. You need to request this from reception as it appears it’s either shared by all guests or they forgot to include one in our room. 

- The Kirana shampoo & conditioner and body wash was very watery, it was no point of even using it

Some other minor observations: 
- Guests had to walk to the front reception each time they wanted to get a towel for the pool which was inconvenient. I feel something like this could easily be improved just by where you store your towels or procedure to provide one 

- Went to use the single treadmill at the gym but it was busted. Went for a jog around the block instead 

Overall I feel there needs to be a proper audit or review of the rooms and amenities by management of this place to be considered as a 4 star standard.
title: Needs improvement

owner_response.text:
Dear Sydney_city_slickers,

Warmest wishes from The Kirana Hotel Resto and Spa!

Thank you for staying with us and we would like to apologize for the inconvenience that you have experienced during your stay. We have start to do some maintenance and improvement from this December.

We do hope that your less than perfect experience will not prevent you from coming back to our hotel whenever your travel plan brings you back to this paradise island.

Sincerely yours,

Dewa Shandi
Resident Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: The hotel looks nice on the outside and pictures. But the hotel inside is kinda badly maintained. I could not drain the water from my bathtub. The staff were wonderful and helpful though.breakfast was yummy!
title: Great staff, but small pool badly maintained.

owner_response.text:

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Loved the hospitality on this budget hotel and the location was perfect for surfing enthusiasts as the beach is just a few meters away with tons of food and bar located nearby. Beds were comfortable. the ground floor is Lil bit busier , is you prefer quiet and privacy opt for higher floors..
title: Amazing Staff and Location

owner_response.text:
Dear N_LizardX,

Warmest wishes from The Kirana Hotel Resto and Spa!

Thank you for taking some of your time to write a review on our TripAdvisor page and we are glad to learn that you enjoyed staying with us. We hope that your nice impression of our hotel will bring you back here in the near future.

Sincerely yours,

Dewa Shandi
Resident Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Stayed here for 2 nights and I must say I’m very disappointed with the stay and service. 

Upon reaching the reception, was checked in by 2 well bodied guys at the counter. After paperwork and welcome drinks, a young petite lady came to help us with the heavy luggages. I ended up moving the luggages to the room myself as I saw the lady having a hard time carrying down just that few steps from the reception. Not forgetting that we had to push our luggages up a steep slope later on to get to the lobby. It was horrible. Don’t understand why the guys couldn’t do the work. 

Room is below average. Bed is ok. Air con produce some weird sweat smell. Poor maintenance. Toilet drainage sucks. Thankfully there is good hot showers. There is a ventilation fan but toilet is just too smelly. No hair dryer. WIFI sucks max. Ground level rooms have to use restaurant WiFi which were super weak or hard to connect.

We made a mistake by booking the room beside the swimming pool because we have people dragging beach chairs early in the morning and people swimming at night.  And the room isn’t so sound proof because there is a lot of gaps at the door. You can clearly hear your neighbours’ conversations. Not very relaxing. So if you want to avoid that, please take rooms on higher floors.

For breakfast, we asked whether we could have it in the room. There is no consistency in their service. The guy staff told us we could not but the lady staff later told him say we could. And she offered to bring breakfast to our room. I forgot her name but great job! Small gesture goes a long way. But my goodness, the guy staff there are just plain lazy. Anyway, the breakfast was good. Only best thing we enjoyed during the stay. 

I applaud for all the female staff there as they are so friendly and helpful. We always return to the same accommodation when we visit Bali but sorry we are not coming back to this hotel. 

Thanks and all the best.
title: Average stay, average service

owner_response.text:
Dear Mcflick89,

Warmest wishes from The Kirana Hotel Resto and Spa!

First of all, we would like to sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you have experienced during your stay and we thank you for your gift of feedback since it allows us to improve our service.

We have very well noted all your concerns and shared with relevant departments for their immediate review and improvement.

We would like to assure you once more that we take your concerns very seriously and appreciate your feedback. We do hope that despite your disappointment on this occasion you will allow us to welcome you back in the near future.

Sincerely yours,

Dewa Shandi
Resident Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: I really enjoyed this hotel during my say. The staff was super friendly and very helpful when needed. The spa is amazing - and I highly recommend utilizing. This hotel is located in the best part of Canggu and isn't bothered by the noise of the street or neighbors. I would stay here again.
title: Very good for the price and best staff

owner_response.text:
Dear CSTMaryland,

Warmest wishes from The Kirana Hotel Resto and Spa!

Thank you for taking some of your time to write a review on our TripAdvisor page and we are glad to learn that you enjoyed staying with us. We really appreciate your feedback regarding our Spa. We hope that your nice impression of our hotel will bring you back here in the near future.

Sincerely yours,

Dewa Shandi
Resident Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: My husband and I took the Balinese cooking class and were taught how to make several local dishes, and once done had a nice dinner on the rooftop of there property. Sugik, Rian, and Chef Eri were all friendly and knowledgeable, which made for a fun learning experience. The staff take many photos, so once complete, you get an email containing the recipes from the class, photos, and a certificate of completion. Loads of fun, would do again!
title: Kirana Cooking Class is a Must!

owner_response.text:
Dear Kutekat82, 

Warmest wishes from The Kirana Hotel Resto and Spa!

Thank you for taking some of your time to write a review on our TripAdvisor page and we are glad to learn that you enjoyed with the cooking class. We really appreciate your feedback regarding our staff. We hope that your nice impression of our activity will bring you back here in the near future. 

Sincerely yours, 

Dewa Shandi
Resident Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Very disappointed in our stay. We stayed in a deluxe room, and were very surprised when we arrived to find how gross it was. Bed was fine although it had stains on the sheets. Many of the lights didn't work in the room (flickered, or were out all together). View was disappointing..cranes and construction. Bathroom was disgusting. Shower doesn't seal shut, so water gets everywhere when you shower. Not enough towels to wipe it all up. Toilet was gross..not very clean. Definitely didn't use the tub..ew. Basically the bathroom was the quality I would expect at a motel or worse.

text:
We were in a second-floor room with a balcony overlooking the pool. The room was a good enough size for two people, with a well-appointed bathroom and a comfortable, large bed. The wardrobe was pretty large, but one of the doors was a bit wobbly which meant care needed to be taken to ensure the internal light went off - otherwise it cast a light across the room at night. We had a small fridge and a TV with a lot of channels - there was always something to watch if it was a little too warm outside... 

The food was consistently good, the staff were lovely and everything worked as it should. The only downsides really were that there were some works going on during our stay, but the staff were good at keeping us informed of a few times when the hot water was turned
off while work was completed and such. This all happened during the day when we were out exploring the beaches, bars and cafes in Canggu so didn't worry us at all. There is a bar, but it's not really a place you'd lounge and spend an evening - there are too many better places nearby for that. For the odd beer, while sat around the pool, it was great.

Things which could improve things a touch? Only one chair on the balcony (had to take the one from the dresser out there), only two small cans of beer in the fridge (there was room for four!) There were a few little maintenance issues (flooring in the restaurant was a bit loose, door handle was a bit clunky) that should be tidied up. Otherwise though, a great value, well-located base in Canggu.
title: Couple staying for nine nights including Nyepi, in March

text:
Apparently based on past reviews about the hotel's aging infrastructure, there was renovation happening during our stay here. The hotel informed us about this before our arrival, and the daytime renovation didn't really affect our stay.

The room we stayed in was clean and very comfortable. The balcony doors had gaps in them, but the hotel fogs for mosquitos so we didn't have any insect problems. The only complaint is that the shower water smells like sulfur for a few moments when the water is first turned on. But being on a volcanic island, perhaps this is normal?

Breakfast was included and the food is delicious, and the choices very varied for a hotel breakfast. Their Western breakfast items were better than the Indonesian choices -- enjoy Indonesian cuisine at far superior restaurants elsewhere in the area. The staff were universally friendly and kind.

Despite all of this, we did have some items stolen from the safe, which we've read can be rather common in Bali. We had set aside an exact amount of money in the beginning of our trip in a separate envelope for an activity we had booked. On the evening of our second day, we came back to our room to discover that the the safe door would no longer open (we didn't forget the password -- we set it as a personally memorable password). After asking the staff to help us open the safe while we were present, we discovered a portion of our money was missing, which we confirmed after calculating all of our expenses.

While the hotel staff was kind and explained all of their safe procedures transparently, they didn't seem too convinced that our money was missing (the amount, while significant in rupiahs, wasn't so much as to attract attention if we hadn't known the exact amount in that envelope). There was no CCTV in the hallways or outside the balcony so the staff had no way of telling if anyone entered our room besides housekeeping. They were also adamant that us being unable to open the safe after returning to the hotel that evening was just a fault of the device, and not indicative of any possible break in. We were even told that safe "errors" occur quite commonly in the hotel, due to their aging safes. 

While we cannot blame the hotel or any specific staff member, the Kirana should really consider installing CCTV cameras in the hallways because this doesn't infringe on guest privacy, but still allows them to keep track of who enters the rooms.

While this doesn't detract from an otherwise great stay, it would be advisable that guests to Bali always be aware exactly how much money is kept aside in hotel safes, as it seems like theft is done in small enough amounts to often times go unnoticed.
title: Great stay but with an important caveat

We are more than disappointed as we came here specifically for a wedding.  My wife needs to feel "clean" but with no hot water it is a bit of an ask.
title: A disappointing stay

We came to the kirana 2 years ago and got the penthouse and it was great. 

2 years later and the room was damaged and very dated. Scratches on the floor and the shower had a distinct stench. This is supposed to be the best room in the hotel and it was run down. 

Also, the wifi didn’t work well in the penthouse. 

We asked to get it fixed but nothing was done. We had to go downstairs to access the wifi, which sucks for a hotel in 2017. 

To end things off the check out girl was pretty rude. Anna I think it was. It was at 1pm on November 26 so whoever that was she wasn’t a fun experience to deal with. 

Overall, I’m sad to write this. We had a great experience 2 years ago but quality went down real fast. 

Ps. They also said they’d transport us to our next destination in Canggu but tried to get us to take a taxi despite saying they would transport us. 

I was pretty tired of dealing with the girl so I was about to just get a taxi but they ended up driving us in the end (with much conflict). Keep this in mind if you want transport from kirana.

First of all, I a travel agent and specialize in Bali, so I've been to many properties on the island, for many years. I stayed here to review the spot, and see if I would suggest bookings for clients. Short story, I would NOT! 

While the staff was very friendly, this ended up not being sufficient enough to overcome what the resort lacks. The property is outdated, and although they are starting to do some renovations, you will also have to deal with the construction noise (supposedly done around May2018). 

It does have a good location in Canggu and right on the Main Street, so walking is easy to restaurants, beach, and bars. 

If I were to give a value to this resort, I would say guests should not pay over $30 Per night. But regularly twice if not three times as much. 

I will not be staying here again.
title: Outdated and mediocre ...

text: The rooms are nice and a good amount of space. The bed was comfy, the AC worked well, and for the most part everything worked as expected. The pool is nice and kind of protected from the noise of the road by the hotel's design, though you can hear people in and around it in the evening. This wasn't a big deal and they have hours when ppl aren't supposed to be out there. But the thing that is really great about the Kirana is the staff. Everyone I interacted with was kind and fun--as though they really enjoyed being there and what they were doing. Either they were genuinely happy or they fake it well. The spa is fantastic and the staff there are especially great. The location is pretty nice, too, in that you can easily walk to restaurants, bars and shopping, and of course the beach.
title: Relaxing and great staff

text:
I had four nights at The Kirana. This is a good hotel and definitely one to consider on a budget. There are pro's and con's to this little boutique hotel and it does feel as if it was built quickly and rushed to get opened.  

Pro's: the incredible staff. They were all so friendly and accommodating and did their absolute best to attend to any issues and offer help and assistance when needed. I can't speak highly enough about the staff at The Kirana. I've travelled a lot, and they were definitely some of the most friendly and helpful. The breakfast was great and the hotel is in a great (if not, perfect) location. 

Con's: We had a few issues which included the toilet not working, the air conditioner didn't seem to really work despite being left on at 18 degrees, the shower pressure was not great (I wasn't able to wash the shampoo out of my hair properly) and the hotel is in need of a thorough deep clean and maintenance.  

All in all, you get what you pay for and for the good price, this is definitely a good choice when staying in Canggu.
title: Incredible staff, good location

text: I stayed here as a solo female traveller and couldn't rate the hotel more highly. The location is great, right in the middle of Canggu and so close to the beach. The staff are very friendly and the breakfasts are great. Plus they have free bicycles rentals at the hotel and can sort trips/ scooters for you. Would stay here again

text: Great hotel near to beach. Rooms are clean. Staff are friendly. They can book you surfing and trips. Always happy to help no matter what time of day. I thought they were a pretty decent price for what you get. TV for when you are beat from the surf and just want to chill.
title: Good clean hotel close to beach

text:
The Kirana is in a great location, minutes away from trendy shops, cafes and bars. However other than the location the negatives outweighed the positives. 
Cons
-The Bathroom stunk and needs renovating ; sewerage smell strong in shower. 
-Room was musty and on the smaller side. 
-Breakfast at hotel restaurant was ordinary and it is well worth spending the money on a fresh brekkie at Crate or BetelNut right down the road. 
- Pool area intimate (cramped) and lacking atmosphere. 

Pros
-Comfy bed
-Great spa treatments at Kirana spa
-Complimentary bottled water daily

Will try somewhere else next time.
title: Average

text:
Spa Kanaya @ The Kirana Hotel Resto and Spa
We were staying in Canggu, and walked past the Kirana seeing the advertising for the Spa we decided to check them out. Great staff - Aiik in particular was so great, even giving me her personal mobile so that we could text to book appointments through her. The massages were great, they thought it was hilarious that my father in law enjoyed his massage so much that he promptly fell asleep and snored the whole way through. We visited multiple times, I recommend you book, they were busy, but with Canggu growing they’ll get even busier.
title: Fantastic - Spa Kanaya

text: From the surface a nice and new hotel with good prices, but all the common complaints listed before appear valid. Extending your checkout troublesome staying at the ground floor near swimming pool troublesome, repairs not carried out, missing leadership. The service of the people in the restaurant is good, breakfast is good, dinner was good. Good advantage is the area is developing so great new spots to drink and eat nearby. Spa also recommendable.
title: Ok

text:
beautiful place - you can't get much closer to batu belong beach while staying in an OK hotel if that's your aim (although once the new hotels are up there will surely be better options)

Outside-beautiful layout without a doubt. Feels expensive, unfortunately the inside disappoints

Room 207:
-shower smells of sewage once the water is on 
-aircon started leaking water onto the floor and kept switching off at night despite there not being any switch off timer setting in place
-many Mosquitos In toilet and in the room, despite the balcony door being closed
-got stuck in lift due to a power failure
-ocean view from 207 isn't really a direct view. You have to exit to the balcony and look 90 degrees left to see the lovely ocean. This privilege will be extinguished soon as a new hotel coming up will likely obstruct your view 
-breakfast is decent, but they should make fresh juices instead of serving concentrated bitter packed ones. Afterall, everyone else in canggu is competiting with their own fresh juice concoctions 
-wifi is dreadfully slow. It's surely not due to the location, as old mans bar and grocer& grind on the echo beach side have fast wifi

This place is an ok choice if you grab it on a good discount. Full price would not be justifiable.
title: Nice on the outside, but unfortunate on the inside

text:
Agree with the official description. Friendly staff and helpful. The vibe is sophisticated/relaxed island.  I love it! Balinese Dance evening and Cooking School looked interesting but I was out too much to participate! 

Interestingly placed, ten minutes walk from beach and huge beach cafe. Surrounded by cute eateries and enticing clothes shops. Loads to do although Kirana Hotel maintains a peaceful atmosphere away from the outside busyness.

Will return !
title: Family 10 days

text:
Excellent bargain.  Rooms were wonderful...better than many American hotels.

The restaurant was excellent and the staff were all helpful.

Only gripes:  Wifi did get a bit slow during peak hours.  Also, Canngu is not very Uber-friendly.  Local taxi very pricey compared to Uber.  Not the hotel's fault though!
title: 6 nights

text:
This was our second time staying at the Kirana and have previously had a great experience. Unfortunately this time the bathroom was much more aged and unclean (what a shame we were too scared to use the bath cause there were stains).

When we were leaving in a "grab taxi" as the price was 1/5th of the price offered by local cab drivers. the staff at the Kirana alerted the local group of taxi drivers who threatened two of the cab drivers we ordered until they cancelled our bookings. The local cab drivers then threatened us with violence unless we took their cabs meanwhile the staff at the Kirana sat idle. I'm shocked to be treated this way. I respect the need to support local economies but when you charge people extortionate rates simply for being a tourist and then threaten them with violence it goes a bit far.

The Kirana were completely complicet in this racket, even putting us in harms way by alerting the local cab drivers in the first place.
title: Threatened with violence.

text: Nice hotel with pool and massage. Rooms are not too big. There is parking where we suits to leave bike with surf board. 4-th floor (roof) is amazing for sunset. Two great places for breakfast and dinner are close: Crate and Beetlenut. Pool access rooms are noisy.
title: Hotel near surf spot

text:
It is a terrible review, but the truth needs to be told. 

While the hotel has a special offers page. On checking out you find that the special offer does not apply in "high season" Despite being told at reception when booking (and paying the non refundable deposit) it does apply. 

http://www.thekiranabali.com/special-offers.php?#hotel-in-bali-special-offers

Issue 1. - We book the penthouse for 2 nights, Love it and request it for 5 more based on the websites pay 3 stay 4. At reception I am shown a calculator with the price per night based on the stay 4 pay 3. I accept this, hand over my credit card and they take payment and issue me a credit card receipt only. Just before checking out I find out this rate has not been applied, But a "special rate" which was a normal rate with a 2 course dinner thrown in.

On reporting this I am told I should have calculated the payment myself on the bill before paying, I inform the manager I was not given a bill, only shown the rate on a calculator after showing his staff the price listed on the website and I am told I should have asked for the itemised bill. 

FYI, As I type this the internet still says stay 7 pay 6 - FYI we are on day 11. I have attached a photo so if the website gets changed you will know. 

Issue 2. Still thinking we have a great rate we decide to stay, this time in a suite as the penthouse is booked. Going for breakfast I ask reception if the suite is free and am told it is for another week, I ask them to reserve it and am told they will. I go to breakfast, come back, go to reception and am told "sorry sir it is booked"

Issue 3. I accept 2 nights in a suite and 1 night in a standard room, I am told the standard room is $100. I tell them I have seen it is cheaper on the internet (which is not working at that time in the hotel) and ask for the internet rate. Reception makes a call and says "yes sir $90" I accept make payment then head to a cafe to use the internet. I find the advertised rate is $63.

Issue 4, I tell them I am moving out because the internet doesn't work and the room we are moving to in 2 days is not suitable. We get told the penthouse has been cancelled and is available. We are given another "special rate" including massages and the difference in price. On the phone I confirm the rate twice "so it is roughly US$100 on what we have paid" "Yes Sir", and I confirm once. "is the massage for 2 people" "Yes Sir". We agree and move rooms.

Issue 5, We get an invoice for US$260 as the difference in room rates. 

I report this difference immediately and the manager tells me she was standing next to the girl on the phone and the price was quoted and the massage was for one person  I explain that I clearly asked the question on the difference in price and also confirm the massage, She does not respond. - So why didn't the manager deal with the issue herself? If she had she would have heard my very specific and clear questions.  

Issue 6. I did not receive a bill until I asked for an itemised account. This is when I discovered the stay 1 night free did not apply. 

The resident Manager Komang Sri Dewi was useless. She would only communicate through her manager (who for most of this would only communicate through his manager, who by the way WAS STANDING NEXT TO THE RECEPTIONIST when she was confirming the US$100 difference and then emailed me the higher bill.

The resident manager according to the (middle) manager apparently takes the managers wages if they don't collect the full amount of money - So apparently its ok for them to steal my money or the staffs. 

The staff were friendly unfortunately because of the issues I can only rate the place as terrible. 

Their response to my complaint when I found out (on the second last day) what we were being charged (ripped off). Pay or get out. So we are leaving.
title: Don't trust the special offers page - Disgusting Cheats and the internet barely works

owner_response.text:
Dear Scott,

Thank you for your review which we need to clarify, since there is a mis-understanding going on. i am Komang Sri Dewi, the manager.

We are a very open company and we are legalize by law of Indonesia and we are in Bali, we believe in karma, so will never cheat our guest, but very sorry that you feel so. No false information is being hidden from our website. 

However, we need to make things right.

We do have a stay pay, with terms and condition applied, which you might not aware.
- stay pay is not valid during high season (August) and Peak Season (Xmas and new years). this is applied commonly by hotels.
- stay pay is not valid for consecutive stay. 

I am most of the time meeting the guest, except Saturday and Sunday, that is why I can only communicate things via phone, and I trust that i have a great team thaT been supporting us since the beginning of this hotel open.

Linda, the girl you met in the reception is my sales team, and I do checking all the system and the flow communication regarding to your concern, and nothing when wrong. 

However, thank you so much that you delivering this information to us, for our future improvement on how to make sure our guest not miss-assume our policy and agreement.

do stay in touch,

Sincerely,
Komang Sri Dewi
rm@thekiranabali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
Splash out and rent the penthouse with rooftop private pool 
The spa there is small but excellent 
Watch the surfers and ocean - with good eyesight - from your terrace and pool whilst sipping a fresh juice 
Nice staff as always in beautiful bali
Would highly recommend the ph
title: Nice new hotel

text: The wantilan lobby upon check in is really something compare to other usual hotel in Bali. They are keeping some slot for rice paddy, pond surrounding the restaurant and the most important is their people, excellent service.
title: Unforgettable Second Stay!

text:
Nice looking hotel though not 4 star 
Gym equipment was 10 years older then the hotel.
Wifi was a major problem always cuts out
Found the reception staff very lovely though the bar / restaurant staff very lazy and not doing anything all day but standing around. My wife asked for towels for pool at bar next to pool and was told by 3 staff standing around that she has to get from reception 50m walk to reception then back to pool... That's not good service .. Actually had 2 star accommodate on this .. Very poor training 
I push bikes were old and rusty and bathroom told stained. Shuttle was full each day and asked for a taxi which would cost $5 though told us that only hotel car was available at $10 though we had taxi pick us up before from same area in Canggu. Also was told I had to pay driver cash which is dodgy as I thought it would go onto the bill as paying via MasterCard at end of stay!
title: Lacking substance

text:
We were very satisfied and would return. I stayed here for a few days with my wife and a 7 month old doing some surfing. The place was essentially new, with groovy modern architecture.

Pros
- easy walking distance from the beach
- beach at the end of the road is amazing for learners/long boarders, and intermediate/advanced surfers can find good waves a short walk over the point
- Cool grubby boho pubs at the beach are fun and popular
- Canggu has more of a laid back hippy vibe than busier places to the south
- slick clean comfortable new rooms. 
- front desk staff are super helpful and capable
- bikes free to use
- coffee was excellent
- free wifi worked ok most of the time
- some cool eateries within walking distance

Cons
- we found the surf obscenely crowded
- as previous reviewers noted, common areas lack a little atmosphere
- single albums seemed to go on repeat for most of the day, drove us a bit mad as our room was in earshot
- tight hotel footprint meant not much room around the pool. Getting to our room with luggage meant virtually bumping our way through sun bathers. 
- no shade over any part of the pool prevented me spending as much time in there as I would have liked. 
- food and menu was pretty standard stuff but well priced
- the day spa was also a pretty standard offering
title: Very well presented Helpful staff

text:
Thank you to all the staff, my partner and I had a great holiday!

Lovely hotel in a nice quite location and very reasonably priced. Service with a smile, well serviced room every day, organised dinners and transport promptly.

Breakfast was average but lucky for us 'Monsuir Spoon' and 'Grocer and Grind' are a short walk and provide a fantastic breaky and beat coffee in Bali.

Only lost 2 stars, one for not cleaning the pool side sun beds (stained, dirty and quite sandy) you should consider dry cleaning or replacing and giving them a wipe down twice a day.

The other star was lost for not having any sparkling wine and refusing to get any when it's on your menu. We stayed for 8 days and I was asking for sparkling wine on our first day. if sparkling wine is to difficult to stock you should remove it from your menu so as not to disappoint future guests. 

They make a good cocktail but a slow one. Loved the idea of the courtesy bike but they only had 3 and they were always out... 6-8 would be a better number to have.

Nice place to stay if you hate the hustle and bustle of Bali with more than enough cafes, restaurants, bar and shops to amuse yourself.
title: Nice but still needs improving.

text: Very friendly staff, they organised a scooter for us so me and girlfriend cruised around local streets exploring cafes and beaches!  Breakfast was included though found nearby cafes better in this area.  Well priced for value and cleanliness!
title: Comfortable fun stay!

text:
Loved everything about this hotel, it is a smart modern hotel of only thirty bedrooms, we had a small suite which was excellence, large bed, excellent bathroom good space in lounge and two TVs. The hotels pool is lovely, they could perhaps a few more loungers but space around the pool is limited. 

Breakfast at they hotel was excellent and prepared to order, in the evening  there was a good range of choices on the menu at a reasonable price and  we had eat here about 4 times over our two week stay and all meals were very good. 

All the staff in the hotel were wonderful, attentive, friendly, efficient they really did help to make this hotel special.

My wife and I are well past the age of surfing but found much to enjoy in this low key resort. The hotel is a short distance from the beaches. There are several good restaurants within walking distance of the hotel and prices are often very cheap compared with the UK and all the meals we had were very good, we like eating local foods but there were also plenty of western style choices. There are also some nice small upmarket clothing shops opening up in the area.

We did some day trips out using the hotel driver and car - ten - eleven hour day touring  for  75 Dollars. Could probably get it cheaper but driver was excellent and cars  new and comfortable.
If you want  low key tourism this is an ideal location, the hotel looks out over rice fields.
Due to its location this hotel will obviously appeal to surfers but  those who are not surfers will find much to enjoy

We had a lovely two weeks here and  would very much hope to return. A really relaxing location.
title: Holiday Bliss

text: We stayed at the Kirana for one night. The girl at reception who welcomed us was very friendly and professional. Our room was located on the 3rd floor and had a great view towards the sea. You could see clearly it’s a relatively new hotel. We had a nice comfortable bed and large television with a lot channels. The pool is not so big, but I guess most people who visit this area will go to the beach anyway. The beach is not far from the hotel. It’s more quite compared to Seminyak or Kuta and has good surfing possibilities. Another thing we really like was the gym. It’s not that big but has all necessary equipment for the sportive amongst us. We didn’t try the spa, but we assume it’s as good as the rest of the hotel. The restaurant is good, but the menu is not so big. This not a real problem because there are so many good restaurants in the area. The hotel can arrange scooters for rent, which is the best way to go around in this area. Canggu is a rather large area and the distance is a bit far to cover all on foot. It’s perfect for people who want to avoid the chaos around Kuta and Seminyak. Compared to other hotels from the same range in the area the price is really good. If we come back to Canggu, we’ll stay here again for sure.
title: Nice and clean hotel with very friendly staff

text: First impression very good! I love it that they have spa in the premise, a pool and a restaurant. Makes everything really simple. Staff is friendly & helpful. Convenient location. We had a great suite. Will definitely recommend.
title: Great hotel friendly staff & service

text: One night in this really nice hotel ! Looks definitively new ! All people was so nice and helpful. Cold drink when arriving. Too short time spent their ! business trip with a tv crew. lunch possible at 3 pm ! Great
title: I would recommand this hotel

text: We spent 10 enjoyable nights at the Kirana. The staff were extremely helpful and the resort was very good. We were pleased with the location as it was nice and quiet. The meals were top quality and beautifully presented. We will definitely be returning.
title: A delightful holiday.

text:
We spend 1 week at the The Kirana Hotel in Canggu Bali. The hotel was finished Nov 2013, so everything is brand new and clean. When we arrived the welcome from the staff was very warm with a welcome drink. In the hotel is a spa with really fair prices. The hotel restaurant offers delicious menus for good prices. The hotel is located 5 min from the beach (surf beach, not really for swimming due to high waves). There are other restaurants in walking distance. The hotel offers free bicycles for rent also. I really loved the location cause it's away from the stress, crowds and noise in Denpasar. 

We really recommend the hotel to anyone who wants a relaxed holiday, you have everything you need in the hotel. 

We will be back definitely cause it was really relaxing. 

Pro:
quiet location
very good condition (built in Nov 2013)
very clean
lovely and warm staff
everything you need is onsite 
nice pool 
nice spa

Cons:
none :)
title: Relaxing holidays at the Kirana in Canggu

owner_response.text:
Dear Gordon_815,

Greetings from The Kirana Hotel Bali!

Thank you for taking the time to share your recent one week experience on Trip Advisor.
Great review! 

I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed the services and facilities of our hotel.

Many thanks on your compliments especially on our services; we will share along all of your comments to our staffs as they will appreciate your kindness. The photos are great as well.

Very much look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel and explore another fabulous experience in the future.

With my best regards,

Komang Sri Dewi
Resident Manager
info@thekiranabali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

photos.caption: View from room, pool by night

text: It´s experiences like this that makes me happy, that I usually only pre book one night at a hotel, in order to see if its a place I want to spend more nights. In this case it wasn´t, actually I couldn´t get away from there quick enough! The hotel is new and generally nicely built but with a few architechtural flaws in my opinion. In example the gym built on 1st floor blocking the seaview from the balconies. If it wasn´t for the staff, the hotel would have good potential. I was traveling with an Indonesian friend and was horrified to see how the staff addressed her, especially the waiter in the restaurant who was extremely condescending and patrionizing towards her unless westerners were with her. It is shameful having staff acting like this and made our stay very uncomfortable. So my advise is to not go here if you want to have a holiday where you want to be treated nice and  equally. Furthermore we were told when checking in that breakfast was served until 11 a.m. but when we arrived at 10.42, we were told that breakfast was over. When complaining about this they acknowledged they might have given us wrong information, but not even a simple apology was given, which would have been the least they could do. So the conclusion of our stay is that we didn´t get what we paid for - only bad service from an incompetent and rude staff that are clearly not trained to work in the hotel business.
title: Rude and incompetent staff

owner_response.text:
Dear Sturmer1,

Thank you for your feed back during your 1 night stay on March 24 - 25, 2014, in our Kirana Room Ocean View. 

On behalf of the management, I would like to apologize for the inconvenience. The staff training is on progress at all times, however, we are reviewing the staff in-charge during the time you've experienced the  inconvenience during your breakfast time. And if there is no improvement from the staff, we will definitely not extending the employment contract.

We are taking very serious for every effort in meeting our Guest satisfaction and services.
Please feel free to contact us directly, if any assistance we can be of.

Thank you for your kindly attention, and hope to have another change to welcoming you back again at The Kirana Bali, in Canggu, with a great experience with us.

Best Regards,
Resident Manager
info@thekiranabali.com
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Really enjoyed our stay in Kirana hotel. First we were upgraded to Penthouse. We did not expected such a nice surprise. Private pool with sunset was outstanding. Bluebird taxi to Jimbaran about 210k. Walking distance to the beach. Don't hesitate to choose massage there it is worth it.
title: Best massage ever

text: Booked for 3 days and stayed 3 weeks ! . Modern new well designed and laid out hotel with spacious rooms. Superb views of the ocean and beautiful rice fields in one of the best central locations in Bali.Peaceful and only 20 mins from Seminyak by complimentary shuttle that runs twice a day. Airports transfers provides for stays 4 days and longer . Perfectly clean and hotel build and fittings in general are of a much higher quality than normally found in Bali . Unobtrusive professional 24 hr security ensured peace of mind .Relaxing infinity type pool surrounded by decking and lounges that gets sun all day long was my personal favourite. Only a 5 min walk to Bali's famous west coast surf beaches that stretch for miles and are far cleaner than Kuta and Legian. Complimentary breakfast was included and restaurant serve up tasty meals all day anytime until 10pm . Also Canngu in general has many great relaxed cafes, restaurants and bars . Have to say that what really made my stay was the staff, a refreshingly happy fun bunch of people that provided service with a smile , yet were relaxed , low key and great to have a laugh and a chat with . Thanks Guys and Girls ! . Shaun.
title: Absolutely loved it

text:
I went here with my partner from Denmark. 
Overall,the view was great we got eco beach sea view, ricefield, pool, sunset. 
But then got dissapointed just bcause we got confirmation that bfast end at 11am. We came at 10.42am and they said its closed already.
Sad isn't it? And there's nothing they can do about it even just a sorry. How would you say about that?
title: Oh sometimes little thing can ruin your huge things!

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
What can I say   ..arrived at midnight and there are 2 people waiting to check me in ...felt strange doing it at this time of night but their friendly smiles made it so much easier ... the staff , the hotel and the pool and the view are all worth the unbelievable price per night one pays ...
Loved the fact that the hotel is but a very small walk to Batu Beach and Old mans Cafe   very lovely to be able to borrow a hotel bike and just go for a ride ..even one of the staff lent me his motorbike at no cost to explore the area ....
All in all  a great little find in Canggu
title: Groovy hotel

text: This hotel at the time of this writing is only about 4 months old. The staff, location, food, cleanliness, and everything was great. The beach is only a short walk away. The view of the rice fields, ocean, and sunset from the balconies was perfect. I would surely stay here again.
title: Great place to stay in Canggu

text: Upon arrival, drinks and a face washer were supplied, along with a very friendly greeting from all the staff. We stayed in a pool access room which was very spacious and very clean. A turn-down service was provided which included them spraying the room for mozzies (which was great!). Food from the restaurant was amazing and so were the drinks. The beach was a 5 minute walk from the hotel and the Spa had just opened and got to experience a lovely balinese massage.
title: Surprising little gem!

text: it was a great pleasure staying in this hotel. the staff are friendly from front office to security. close to beacha nd local restaurant. very good locationa nd it's so quite. loving the beach view room!
title: new promising hotel

text: A very clean and nice hotel away from the busy streets. Staffs and the hotel manager are all very friendy. Strongly recommend.  Will be better if there is a complimentary transfer from and to the airport.
title: A very new and modern hotel. The massage is excellent

text: We stayed with my partner here for 4 nights. It was really good value for money. Staff is smiling all the time, trying to help. In our accomodation we did have included the hotel transfer, short massage for both of us, breakfast and one night also dinner. Fo 50 USD/night is really great value for money. Just to reming it's a bit far from all of the main areas - Kuta, Semenyak or Ubud.
title: Nice place, hidden from touristic areas

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
we are staying at Kirana Pool Access with my wife and 10 years old son. I was surprised with their lobby reception and rice field before entering the hotel to get to their rooms and other facility. they just opened few days before our arrival, the room is nice and we have brought to deluxe room with an amazing ocean view, great sunset and spacious room. we were thought next time we should try the deluxe room.
the staff is young and talented, willing to help, smiling and genuine. 
there is push bike that we used to go to the beach every morning before jump to the swimming pool while waiting our breakfast. they are also providing shuttle service to kuta and legian but we didn't use it.
I would have no hesitation to recommend to colleagues, friends and family
title: Beautiful Experience
